Iwe Mary yesa hasi sew molorol loy kowe ye ffaor mo irel nard we ye chow paliyal yesa hasredi wol mokwe pechel Jesus. Iwe yesa teptap mokwe yael chemal yesa hapalpale ngal mokwe pechel Jesus. Yesa suk bool loy we ye momay lal imw we.
Judas Iscariot we semal mokwe redabeyel Jesus ngo iy molwe yebe fangloh Jesus yesa sor bo,
“Meda mele site tapeli chuway loyle le be sulbuguy dolla paliyal bo sibe ngaler mael hafohoy mala salpiyal bo layur iyang?”
Ye sor molwe le te fal mala iy ye luluwaler mael hafohoy, bo mil mala iy ila ye machoh. Iy mele yema halili layur salpiy iwe ngo yema peraf mo iyang.
Iwe ngo Jesus yesa sor bo, “Ha ligdi fefel la! Ha ligdi bo yebe haliliya bo holgul ralla rebe lebayey iyang.
Pangal yad ngo ma yor mael hafohoy iremi, ngo ngang ila te pangal yad ngo iy be mel iremi.”
Ye cholop yarmat le re rongrong bo ye mel Jesus wol Bethany. Iwe resa loh loboswe le te Jesus chog mele re loh irel, bo re wol loh bo re bela wiri Lazarus we Jesus ye hamolowa tefaeli mo irel maes.
Iwe tamol temarong kowe resa luluwaley le rebe wol limeseloh Lazarus,
bo yesa cholop Jews le resa tagul tangir bo resa chepar irel Jesus le fael molwe Jesus ye faor ngal Lazarus.
Yela ralawe seral ngo buwa we re budoh irel molwe Bungul Paska, resa rongrong le Jesus yebe budoh woal Jerusalem.
Iwe resa kak paddol resa buyoy bo re bela wiri Jesus. Re tetawul le re sor bo, “Habe hapingpingah ho Deus! Deus mele yebe holbuwa yeramtala ye budoh fael idel Samol! Deus yebe holbuwa King la yar re Israel!”
Jesus yesa dage semal donkey kowe ye chil wechich le ye wochog molwe babior we ye santus ye sor irel bo,
“Ho towe motog gel haplomol Zion! King we yami iye yesa budoh le ye dage semal donkey kowe ye chil wechich.”
Irel yodla ngo mokwe redabeyal re temedaf irel molwe. Ngo yodwe yela molow tefael Jesus mo irel maes, ngo yesa kkaweraloh falmay la yal wol laeng, ngo yesa moch mmang ngalir le babior we ye santus ye sor mele irel kofal. Iwe ngo wol ila sengal mala re faor ngali.
Rechokwe re mel irel yodwe Jesus ye hamolowa tefaeli Lazarus mo irel maes ngo ye fesanguwey mo lal pewe, re kapta fedaley molwe Jesus ye foru.
Ila fal le ye budoh buwa we irel iyang bo re rongrong le iy Jesus mele ye foru kkemal we.
Ngo Pharisees kowe resa kapta fengali le re sor bo, “Hasa wiri, tayor mele be chil yoh le sibe foru! Hate kalloh habe kemahoy, pangal yarmat ngo resa dabey!”
Tot yarmetael Greece re mel luwulur rechokwe resa loh Jerusalem bo re bela dabey molwe Bungul Paska.
Re loh irel Philip (le semal yarmetal Bethsaida le sew haplom le ye mel woal Galilee) re sala kangalu bo, “Ha dipli melap bo habe rol werfengal mo Jesus.”
Yesa loh Philip ye sala kangalu Andrew molwe. Iwe resa chufengal re sala kangalu Jesus.
Jesus sa hatefaeli ngo sa sor bo, “Yesa hola yodwe Deus yebe fang falmay la ye palleng ngal mala Layur Retalop.
Iy be kangalugmi mala tosal: sefaes uwal wheat le hare yebe te pungdi luwul bool bo yebe mes, ngo yebe mel chog le ye hal sefeas loh chog. Iwe ngo hare yebe mes ila ngo yebe cholop uwal.
Semal le yebe hachangi yal ngas ngo yebe pung tangi; ngo semal le yete hachangi yal ngas wol talop le, ngo yebe yoh ngali molow la tor siyal.
Semal le ye dipli bo yebe mel bo yai boy bo yebe yengang ngalyey ngo yebe dabeyey. Ngo solbos la iy be mel iyang ngo boy la yai yebe mel irey. Iwe ngo mala Temay yebe fang ssor ngal semal le yebe mel bo yai boy.
“Igla ila yesa tayikof depey, ngo meda mele ngang iy be sor? Iy be sor bo, ‘Temay Deus, ho towe habulangoyey luwul hafohoy le’? Ila mele fael yai budoh. Ibudoh bo ibe bulong luwul awal hafohoy le.
Temay Deus, fang ssor ngal mala idem!” Iwe ngo yesa malilidiy Deus mo wol laeng le ye sor bo, “Isa mol fang ssor ngal mele Idey ngo ibele wol fang fael sew.”
Buwa we re su lobos we re rongrong molwe. Tot ir re sor bo ngungul parr. Iwe ngo ikowe sibis re sor bo, “Semal angelus le yesa malili ngali!”
Ngo Jesus yesa kangalur bo, “Molwe hasa rongrong ila te fal ngalyey bo fal ngalugmi.
Yesa hola yodwe Deus yebe hatugulu kofer yarmetal faileng le, ngo ye bele hachuyaloh yeramtala ye lamli faileng le.
Yodla ibe tagiyet tang talop le, iwe ngo pangal yarmat ngo rebe budoh irey.”
(Ye sor molwe bo yarmat rebe gola wululul hafohoy la yebe mes iyang.)
Buwa we resa hatefaeli ngo resa sor bo, “Hatobtob we yach ye kangalugich le Kristus ila yebe molow le tor siyal. Ngo meda mele hola sor le mala Layur Retalop ila rebe hatagitadah lemayural iyang? Itey iy mala Layur Retalop?”
Jesus yesa hatefaeli ngo sa sor bo, “Teram le ila yebe chil sulay sugfed yal mel luwulumi. Ha tataboloh chog mekla ha foforu irel yodle ye chil mel teram le iremi bo hade bulong luwul rochupung. Bo yeramtala yema darloh luwul rochupung ila ye togla lobosle ye loloh iyang.
Ila ha chepar ngal teram la irel yodle ye chil mel iremi bo habe mel bo yarmetal luwul teram.” Wol miril yael Jesus kapta molwe ngo yesa loh sala mwol tangir.
Molwe mwo resa wiri pangal kkemal kowe Jesus ye foru mo fael meter ngo ir re techepar irel.
Bo molwe profeta Isaiah ye sor irel ila yebe llah le ye katos: “Samol, itey le ye chepar irel mokwe hamem hasa kapta? Itey semal le Samol yesa haleha ngali lepal mala kkelal?”
Iwe sala teyoh la rebe chepar bo Isaiah ye wol sor bo,
“Deus yesa piltaloh mekla meter, mo luluwal kala yar, bo yede yoh le rebe wiri formel ngo ye medaf yar luluwal. Deus ye sor bo, ‘Iy sa foru mele bo yede yoh le rebe tagul ngalyey bo iy be hachuya yar tomay.’”
Isaiah ye kapta mele bo ye wiri falmay la yael Jesus iwe yesa kapta kofal Jesus.
Ngo ligdi bo ye cholop mokwe metal yalor Jews le re chepar irel Jesus, ngo fael mala re metagur Pharisees kowe mele rete kapta fedaley iyang bo Pharisees kowe rede hachuyar loh mo lal imwel ttey kowe yar.
Ye kkel tot yar dipli le yarmat mele rebe hapingpingar mo imol mala Deus mele yebe hapingpinar.
Jesus ye kapatpat le ye hapalingi yalol le ye sor bo, “Semal le ye chepar irey ngo te ngang chog mele ye chepar irey, bo ye wol chepar irel yeramtala ye fangdoh ngang.
Iwe ngo semal le ye wiryey ngo ye wol wiri yeramtala ye fangdoh ngang.
Ibudoh lal failengle le ngang teram, bo panger rechokla re chepar irey ngo rebe chuy mo luwul rochupung.
Hare semal le ye rongrong meka ikapta ngo yete dabey, ngo ngang itowe hatugulu kofal. Ite budoh le ibe hatugulu kofer re faileng le, bo ibudoh bo ibe hadorar.
Ye mel semal le iy mele yebe hatugulu kofal semal le yete dipilyey, ngo yete dabey meka yaloy. Meka sa mol yai kapta ila, ika meka yebe hatugulu kofal semal mo semal irel yodla miril faileng!
Mele ila ye katos, bo ite kapta le yaloy chog lufulyey bo mala Temay le ye fangdoh ngang mele ye kangaluyey mele ibe kapta.
Ngo Ngang igula le mekla yema sor ila yema fang molow la tor siyal. Meka ikapta ila, ika meka mala Temay ye kangaluyey bo ibe kapta.”
Ralale ila safe seral ngo sa hola molwe Bungul Paska. Jesus ye gola le sa hola yodwe iy yebe chutang talop le bo yebe loh irel mala Temal. Pangal yad ngo iy Jesus ye hachangir meka lol lal faileng le, ngo hachangcheng la yal ngalir ila tor siyal yee, yela hola miril faileng.
Jesus mo mokwe redabeyal re momongol fehaf. Iwe ngo yesa mol yael Moniyan we hadepdepa Judas we lol Simon Iscariot bo yebe fangloh Jesus.
Jesus ye gola le mala Temal yesa fang ngali pangal formel bo yebe lamli. Ngo ye gola le iy ye budoh mo irel Deus ngo ye bele tefael loh irel Deus.
Yesa sudah mo irel tis we ngo yesa hachuya molwe lugul mengagol. Iwe yesa hasi sew tawon sa langba ngal molwe lochochol.
Iwe yesa haseserdiy chael lal sew tapiy ngo sa chap yal haduduy pecher mokwe redabeyal, sa hapalpale ngal tawon we ye ffor lochochoel.
Yela hola doh Simon Pedrus ngo Simon sa kangalu bo, “Samol, ho luluwaley le hobe haduduy meka pechey?”
Jesus sa hatefaeli ngo yesa sor bo, “Ho temedaf irel mele ifoforu igla ngo bela seral ngo ho bele moch medaf.”
Pedrus yesa sor bo, “Tor fael sew le hobe haduduy meka pechey!” Jesus sa kangalu bo, “Hare ibe te haduduy mekla pechem, ila ngo gel ho towol mel bo re dabeyey.”
Simon Pedrus yesa hatefaeli ngo yesa sor bo, “Samol, ila ngo te meka chog pechey mele hobe haduduy! Hobe wol haduduy meka payi mo mele chemey!”
Jesus yesa sor bo, “Semal le sa mol mo irel dudu ila ye towol dudu, bo mekla chog pechel mele yebe haduduy. Pangami ngo sa tefoy mekla holongmi, sa halachog semal mo luwulumi mele te ila sengal.”
(Yeramtawe yebe fangloh Jesus ila, iy Jesus ye gola, ila fal le ye sor bo, “Pangamiloh ngo sa tefoy mekla holongmi, ngo sa halachog semal mo luwulumi mele te ila sengal.”)
Wol miril yael Jesus haduduy mokwe pecher ngo sa hatefaladah molwe lugul mengagol sa tefael loh irel molwe liliyal mo irel tis we. Iwe ngo yesa kasiyar bo, “Ha medaf irel molwe ye moch mol yai foru ngalugmi?
Hama ffesangu ngalyey bo Sensey mo Samol, iwe ngo meka hama sor ila ye bung, bo ila mala ngang.
Ngang le yami Samol mo Sensey mele sa moch mol yai haduduy mekla pechemi. Ila be semal hami ngo ye haduduy pechel semal.
Iy sa kewar ngalugmi mele iy sa foru le be ila sengal le hami habe ma foru.
Iy be kangalugmi mala katosal: tor semal boy le ye tagiyet mo imol yal masta, ngo tor semal re hagloy le ye tagiyet mo imol yeramtala yema hagloyu.
Igla ila hami hasa gola mele le ye katos. Ila hare habe ma foru mele, ila ngo habe mel le ye momay dipmi!
“Te pangami ngo ikekapta kofmi, bo ngang igular rechokla isa duwler. Ngo yesa llah le ye katos yalol babior we ye santus we ye sor bo, ‘Yeramtala ye mongoy ngalyey, ila yesa tagul sa happaliyel ngalyey.’
Ikangalugmi mele igla mo imol mala be weldoh, bo ye bela weldoh ngo habe chepar le ‘Ngang ila Ngang.’
Ibe kangalugmi mala katosal: Semal le yebe hakkula ngal semal le ifangdoh, ila ngo ye hakkula ngalyey. Ngo semal le yebe hakkula ngalyey, ngo ye wol hakkula ngal yeramtala ye fangdoh ngang.”
Wol miril yael Jesus sor mele ngo sa kkeldoh tayikofel lal depal, ngo yesa hamdefa ngalir le ye sor bo, “Ibe kangalugmi mala tosol: Semal hami ila ye bele fangloh ngang.”
Mokwe redabeyal resa kal fengal uwor luwul yar temedaf hare itey molwe Jesus ye kekapta kofal.
Semal ir mokwe redabeyal ila ye marro lengchel. Ila iy yeramtawe iy Jesus ye hachangi.
Simon Pedrus sa pongpong ngali ngo yesa kangalu bo, “Kasiya hare itey iy mala ye kekapta kofal.”
Iwe yeramtawe yesa ger ngal Jesus ngo sa kasiya bo, “Itey ho Samol?”
Jesus sa hatefaeli ngo sa sor bo, “Yeramtala ibe ngaley sedep flowa le ibe chiri lal tohoh le.” Iwe yesa hasi sedep flowa sa chiri, yesa ngaley Judas we lol Simon Iscariot.
Yodwe chog Judas ye hasi flowa we ngo sa mel Satan uwol. Jesus yesa kangalu bo, “Haturug! Hola foru mele hobe foru!”
Tor semal mo irel tis we le ye gola hare meda fal le Jesus ye kangalu molwe iyang.
Ngo fael molwe Judas mele ye holu layur salpiy mele tot mokwe re dabeyel Jesus re kachog bo Jesus ye kangalu bo be loh ye bela chuway hamalel gubul we, hare bela fang formel ngalir mael hafohoy.
Judas ye hasi chog madpil flowa we ngo sa buyoy ligtam. Irel yodla ngo yesa bong.
Yodwe sa loh Judas ngo Jesus sa sor bo, “Igla ila yesa llah ssor la yael molwe Layur Retalop, iwe ngo ssor la yael Deus ila yesa llah mo irel.
Iwe ngo hare yesa llah ssor la yael Deus mo irel mala Layur Retalop, ila ngo be igla chog ngo Deus yesa haleha ssor la yael mala Layur Retalop.
Hami re wol layi ila towol sulay ngo ibele lugdugmi. Hami ila habe meriyey, ngo ibe kangalugmi igla molwe ikangalur tamol kowe yar Jews we ikangalur we isor bo, ‘Towe yoh le habe loh irel lobola ngang ibe loh iyang.’
Igla ila ibele fang ngalugmi sew hatobtob le ye tefoy: Ha hachangi fengalugmi. Habe hachangi fengalugmi le be wochog yai hachangugmi.
Habe hachangi fengalugmi ila ngo pangal yarmat ngo rebe gola le hami re dabeyey.”
Simon Pedrus sa kasiya bo, “Samol, iya lobosle hobe loh iyang?” Jesus sa hatefaeli ngo yesa sor bo, “Igla ila towe yoh le hobe dabeyeyloh lobola ibe loh iyang. Seral ngo ho moch dabeyey.”
Pedrus yesa kasiya bo, “Samol, meda fal le towe yoh le ibe daboh igla iyang? Isa faesul hatugulu le ibe fangloh yai ngas bo yiglug!”
Jesus sa hatefaeli ngo yesa sor bo, “Hosa hatugulu le hobe fangloh yam ngas bo yigilyey? Ibe kangalug mala tosal: Imol mala be kkogo sew mael ngo bele fael suluw yam sor bo ho toglayey.”
Jesus sa kangalur bo, “Ha towe merah ngo towe yeyewal dipmi. Ha hatugulu lal dipmi irel Deus ngo ha wol hatugulu lal dipmi irey.
Ye cholop senggil irel mala imwel mala Temay, ngo ibele loh ibela ffor lilimi mo iyang. Bo hare te ila sengal, ila ngo itowe kangalugmi le ibele loh bo iy bela ffor lilimi mo iyang.
Ibele loh ibela ffor lilimi ngo bela wol miril, ngo isa tefael ibe hasugmiloh ha bela mel irel lobosla ima mel iyang.
Hami ha gola yalepal lobosla ibele loh iyang.”
Thomas sa kasiya bo, “Samol, ha togla lobosle ho be loh iyang, ila ngo be ifa sengal chog ngo ha sala gola mala yalepal?”
Jesus sa hatefaeli ngo sa sor bo, “Ngang mele yalap, ngo ngang mele katos, ngo ngang mele molow; tor semal le be yoh le be loh irel mala Temay le be te budoh mwo irey.”
Yesa kangalur bo, “Igla hasa golayey ila ha bele wol gola mala Temay. Iwe ngo igla ila hasa gola ngo ha wiri iy mala Temay.”
Philip sa kangalu bo, “Samol, kewar ngalugmem mala Tamom ila ngo bele moch fel depmem.”
Jesus sa hatefaeli ngo sa sor bo, “Philip, sa sulay yai paoy ngalugmi ngo ha ted golayey chog? Semal le ye wiryey, ila ngo yesa wiri mala Temay. Ila ngo meda mele hola sor bo, ‘Kewar ngalugmem mala Tamom’ iyang?
Philip, hote chepar le ngang imel irel mala Temay, ngo mala Temay ye mel irey?” Iwe ngo Jesus yesa kangalur mokwe redabeyal bo, “Meka iy kekapta ngalugmi ila te budoh mo irey. Bo mala Temay le ye mel irey mele ye foforu meka.
Ha chepar ngalyey le ngang iy mel irel mala Temay ngo mala Temay ye mel irey. Hare hate chepar iyang ila ngo hasa chepar irel meka iy sa foru.
Ibe kangalugmi mala tosal: Semal le ye tugul lal depal irey ngo be yoh ngali le yebe foru meka ima foru — ila sengal, yebe far paleng tot mekla iy yebe foru bo fal mala ngang ibele loh irel mala Temay.
Te tugul mele habe dongor fael mele idey ngo ibe foru, bo yebe llah ssor la yael Deus le Tamal mo irel mala Lol.
Te tugul mele habe dongor fael mele idey ngo ibe foru.
“Hare ha hachangiyey ngo habe talenga yalol hatobtob ka yai.
Iwe ngo ibe dangro mala Temay ngo iy yebe fang ngalugmi semal re Hammal le pangal yad ngo yebe mel iremi.
Ila mala Espritu Santus le iy mele yebe kawraloh mekla ye katos le kofal Deus. Iwe ngo yarmetal faileng le ila towe yoh ngalir bo fael mala ir re towe wiri ngo re towe gola. Iwe ngo hami ila ha gola bo yesa mel iremi ngo ye mel luwulumi.
“Yodla ibe loh ngo itowe tahchegumiloh bo ibe chil tefaeldoh iremi.
Towe sulay ngo yarmetal faileng le re towol wiryey ngo hami habe chil wiryey bo fael mala imolow mele hami habe wol molow iyang.
Bela hola yodla ngo ha bele gola le ngang iy mel irel mala Temay, iwe ngo hami ha mel irey le ye wochog ngang le iy mel iremi.
“Semal le ye dipli ngo ye taelenga yalol hatobtob ka yai ila ngo ye hachangiyey. Iwe ngo mala Temay yebe hachangi semal le ye hachangiyey. Ngo ngang ibe wol hachangi ngo ibe foru bo iy yebe golayey.”
Judas (te Judas Iscariot) yesa kasiy bo, “Samol, be ifa sengal yam foru bo hamem habe golah ngo yarmetael faileng le re towe golah?”
Jesus sa hatefaeli ngo yesa sor bo, “Te tugul semal le be hachangiyey ngo yebe taelenga yalol foloy ka yai. Iwe ngo mala Temay yebe hachangi. Iwe ngo ngang mo mala Temay habe budoh irel bo habe mel irel.
Semal le yete hachangiyey, ngo ye towe taelenga yalol foloy ka yai. Ngo foloy kala hami hasa rongrong ila te yai bo ye budoh mo irel mala Temay le iy mele ye fangdoh ngang.
“Isa kangalugmi mele irel yodle ichil mel iremi.
Iwe ngo Re Hammal we ila Espritu Santus le mala Temay be fangdoh fael mele idey. Yebe harepiya ngalugmi pangal formel ngo ye hammang ngalugmi pangal mekla sa mol yai foloyu ngalugmi.
“Isa ligid ngalugmi hopos. Hopos le yai iye isa fang ngalugmi. Ite fang le ye wochog yar yarmetal faileng le ma fang. Ila ha towe merah, ngo ha towe rusmes, ngo ha towe motog.
Hasa rongrong yai kangalugmi bo, ‘Ngang ibele loh ngo ibe chil tefaeldoh iremi. Hare ha hachangiyey ngo habe rraey irel mala ngang ibele loh irel mala Temay, bo iy ila ye tagiyet mo imoy.
Isa kangalugmi mele igla mo imol yodla be weldoh pangal meka, bo bela weldoh ngo hami habe chepar.
Towol sulay yach rol hapatpat bo yeramtala ye lamlir yarmetal faileng le ila ye bele budoh. Iwe ngo iy ila tor kkelal uwoy.
Yarmetal faileng le rebe gola le ngang ihachangi mala Temay. Ila fal le iforu pangal mekla iy ye kangaluyey bo ibe foru. “Ha sudah bo si bele chuy mo iga.
“Ngang mele yilgil ire we ngo mala Temay mele chol hammalel.
Yema supiloh ra kala tor uwal ngo ye maldi ra kala yor uwal bo be cholop tot uwal.
Hami ila isa faesul maldugmi irel mokwe isa foloyu ngalugmi.
Hami habe mel chog irey. Ngo ngang ibe mel chog iremi. Bo tor sera ral ire le be iy chog lufulyal ngo yesa yor uwal. Be yoh le be yor uwal igle ye chil tabtob ngal mala yilgil ire we. Ye wol hafedeg ngalugmi chog le towe yoh le be yor uwami le habe te mel irey.
“Ngang mele yilgil ire we ngo hami mele mekla ral. Te tugul semal le yebe mel irey ngo ngang imel irel ngo yebe cholop uwal. Hare ibe tamel iremi ila ngo tor mele be mmal ngalugmi.
Semal le yebe te mel irey ngo be wochog sera ral ire le resa pedaloh sala betbatloh. Ral ire kala ila sengal ila rebe hateyili fengali resa pedadah wulyef bo yebe fisngegloh.
Hare habe mel irey ngo ha itol meka yaloy lal yami luluwal, ila ngo te tugul mele ha dipli habe dongor ngo be yoh ngalugmi.
Yebe llah falmay la yael mala Temay mo irel yal cholop uwami; irel yami mel bo redabeyey.
Ngang ihachangugmi le ye wochog yael mala Temay hachangiyey. Ha mel chog irel hachangcheng le yai.
Hare habe taelenga meka isa kangalugmi ngo habe mel chog irel hachangcheng la yai. Yebe wochog yai taelenga mekla mala Temay ye kangaluyey, ila ngang imel chog irel hachangcheng la yal.
“Ikangalugmi mele bo be yoh ngalugmi rraey le yai, bo be kkel yami rraey.
Iye mele yai hatobtob: Habe hachangi fengalugmi le be wochog yai hachangugmi.
Hachangcheng la ye hartal palleng ila mala semal yebe fangloh yal ngas bo yiglir mekla maryarel.
Iwe ngo hami wol maryarey igle ha foru meka ikangalugmi.
Itay ma ffesangugmi bo hami boy, bo boy ila retema gola mele yar masta ye foforu. Isor le hami maryarey bo isa kangalugmi pangal mekla irongrong mo irel mala Temay.
Te hami mele ha duwleyey. Ngang mele iduwlehmi ngo ihatugulugmi bo habe loh bo bela cholop uwami, le be tapel uwal ire kowe tor fael sew le be tayikof. Ngo te tugul mele ha dangro mala Temay fael mele Idey ngo be fang ngalugmi.
Iye mele ngang ibe kangalugmi bo habe foru: ha hachangi fengalugmi.
“Hare yarmetael faileng le resa hafobdurugmi ngo ha towe maligili le re metamol hafobdiriyey mo imomi.
Hare ha chil mel bo yarmetal faileng le, ila ngo habe chang mo irer bo ha chil mel bo chiler. Iwe ngo ngang isa duwlehmi mo luwulur yarmetal faileng le, ila tay hami choluwar. Ila fal le resa hafobdurugmi iyang.
Habe memangi chog molwe isa kangalugmi: ‘Tor boy le ye tagiyet mo imol yal masta.’ Hare re hafohoyuyey ila ngo rebe wol hafohoyugmi, ngo hare re talenga yalol foloy ka yai ila ngo rebe wol taelenga yalol foloy kala yami.
Ngo ligdi bo rebe faor ngalugmi pangal meka bo fael mala hami layi, ngo ir re togla le iy mele ye fangdoh ngang.
Hare ite budoh hapatpat ngalir ngo towe llah le re molfid. Iwe ngo igla ila towol yoh le rebe sor bo re togla le molfid mekla re foforu.
Semal le yebe hafobdiriyey ila ngo ye wol hafobdiri mala Temay.
Hare ite foru yengang ka ted yor mwo semal le ye foru mo luwulur ila ngo towe llah yar tayikof irel molfid kala re foforu. Iwe ngo igla le resa wiri mele isa foru ila resa hafobdurugmem mo mala Temay.
Mele ila ye faesul tugul le be wel doh bo yebe llahloh le ye katos molwe ye teftaf lal babiorol Hatobtob we yar we ye sor bo: ‘Resa hafobdiriyey le tor fal.’
“Espritu Santus mele Re Hammal le ye bele budoh le iy mele yebe halehaloh mekla ye katos le kofael Deus. Espritu Santus ila yebe budoh mo irel mala Temay. Iwe ngo ibele fangwey iremi bo yebe kapta kofay.
Iwe ngo hami ila habe wol kapta kofay bo chapildah chog yai yengang ngo hami ha dabeyey.
“Ikangalugmi mele bo hade tahcheloh yami tugul.
Re bele hachuyahmiloh mo irel imwel ttey kala yar. Iwe ngo bela hola yodla ngo semal le yebe limeseloh semal hami ngo yebe luluwaley le iy yesa foru sew yengang kala yael Deus.
Yarmat re be faor ngalugmi meka bo fael mala re ted golayey ngo re ted gola mala Temay.
Isa kangalugmi meka bo bela hola yodla rebe faor ngalugmi meka ngo be mmang ngalugmi meka ikangalugmi. “Ite faesul kangalugmi meka igwe bo, ichil mel iremi.
Iwe ngo igla le ibele loh irel yeramtala ye fangdoh ngang, iwe ngo tor semal hami le ye kasiyayey lobole ibe loh iyang.
Igla le isa kangalugmi meka ila bele kkel tayikofel lal dipmi.
Ibe kangalugmi mala tosal: Ye momay mele ibele chuy tangugmi, bo hare ibe te loh ngo Re Hammal la ila ye towe budoh iremi. Ngo hare ibe loh ngo ibe fangdoh iremi.
Yodla bela budoh Re Hammal la ngo yebe kewar ngalir yarmetal faileng lepal yar machey irel kofal molfid mo kofal meka ye bung mo kofal yael Deus hatugul irel kofer yarmetael faileng le.
Re machey irel kofael molfid bo ir ila tor yar tugulul ladep irey;
re machey irel kofal mekla ye bung bo ngang ila ibele loh irel mala Temay ngo hami ha towol wiryey.
Ngo re machey irel kofael yael Deus hatugul bo yeramtala yema weged deper yarmetael faileng le ngal molfid ila Deus sa faesul hatugulu kofal.
“Ye chil cholop mele ibe kangalugmi, ngo halachog ila bele cholop hemas ngalugmi.
Yodla bela budoh Espritu Santus le yema kawraloh mala ye katos le kofael Deus, ngo ye bele kangalugmi pangal mekla ye katos. Te mekla iy ye luluwaley mele yebe kapta kofal, bo yebe kapta kofael mala iy ye rongrong. Iwe ngo yebe wol kangalugmi kofal mekla yebe weldoh.
Yebe fang yai ssor bo ye bele kangalugmi mekla yaloy.
Pangal mekla ye mel irel mala Temay ngo yusuwey; ila fal le iy sor bo Espritu Santus yebe kangalugmi mekla ngang iy kangalu bo yebe kangalugmi.
“Towol sulay ngo hami ha towol wiryeyloh, ngo towe sulay mo wol miril ngo hasa wol wiryey.”
Tot mokwe redabeyal resa kasiy fengal uwor le re sor bo, “Meda fal mele ye kangalgich? Ye kangalgich le towol sulay ngo si towol wiri, ngo towe sulay ngo siya wol wiri. Ngo ye wol sor bo, ‘Ngang iy bele loh irel mala Temay ngo hami ha towol wiryey.’
Meda fal mele ‘towol sulay’? Si tugla fal mele ye kekapta kofal!”
Jesus ye gola le yor mele re dipli bo rebe kasiya. Iwe sa kangalur bo, “Isor bo, ‘Towol sulay ngo hami ha towol wiryeyloh, ngo towe sulay mo wol miril ngo hasa wol wiryey.’ Iye iy molwe ha kekasiy fengal uwomi?
Ibe kangalugmi mala tosal: Ha bele rol tang ngo bele tayikof lal dipmi. Iwe ngo yarmetal faileng le ila re bele rraey. Ye bele tayikof lal dipmi ngo mala tayikofel lal dipmi ila yebe liwel ngal rraey.
Yodla semal fefel yebe harpal dimolow ngo ye bele tayikof depal bo yesa hola yodla ye bele hafohoy irel yal bbareg iyang. Iwe ngo bela subdoh yalwich we lol ngo ye bele maliglaloh hafohoy we yal, bo yesa rraey bo yesa subdoh semal yalwich lal faileng le.
Ila sangmi igla bo ye bele tayikof dipmi. Iwe ngo ibela tefaeldoh iremi ngo hami ha bele rraey. Ila rraey la tor semal le yebe hasi tangugmi.
“Irel yodla ngo tayor mele habe chil dongor ngalyey. Ibe kangalugmi mala tosal: Mala Temay yebe fang ngalugmi pangal mekla habe dangro fael mele Idey.
Yesa holadoh igla ngo tedyor mwo sew formel la dongor fael mele Idey. Ha dongor bo yebe yoh ngalugmi bo yebe kkel yami rraey.
“Ikekangalugmi meka le iteptap fiyong. Iwe ngo ye mel sew yad le itowol teptap fiyong, bo ibele haffadoloh yai hapatpat ngalugmi irel kofal mala Temay.
Irel yodla ngo te tugul mele iy, ngo yebe yoh le habe dongor ngal mala Temay fael mele idey; iwe ngo tayor pelal le ngang ibe dongor ngali bo yaglugmi bo,
mala Temay ila ye hachangugmi bo hami ha hachangiyey ngo ha chepar le ngang ibudoh mo irel.
Ibudoh mo irel mala Temay isa budoh lal faileng le, ngo igla ibele chuy tang faileng le bo ibele tefael loh irel mala Temay.”
Iwe ngo mokwe redabeyal resa kangalu bo, “Igla ila hosa hawwel yam hapatpat ngalugmem le ho tay teptap fiyong,
ila hamem hasa gola le gel ho gola pangal formel. Tayor pelal le semal yebe chil hadogoyug. Gel mele sa hatosiya ngalugmem le gel ho budoh mo irel Deus.”
Jesus yesa hatefaeli ngalir ngo yesa sor bo, “Hasa chepar igla?
Ye mel sew yad le towol sulay ngo ye bele hola gich. Iwe ngo pangami ngo ha bele rol taroprop fedal, le bele semal hami ngo ye loh lubugtal, iwe ngo bele la ngang loh chog. Iwe ngo halachog ila towe ila sengal bo mala ila Temay ye mel irey.
Isa kangalugmi mele bo hare be yoh ngalugmi hopos le fael mala hami hasa mel irel le siya rol sew chog. Yarmetal faileng le rebe hafohoyu fedalehmi, iwe ngo hami hasa hakkela dipmi! Bo ngang ila isa lamliloh faileng le!”
Wol miril yael Jesus sor mele ngo yesa kaledah wol laeng ngo yesa sor bo, “Temay Deus, yesa hola awa we. Fang ssor ngal mala Lom bo mala Lom yebe fang ssor ngalug.
Bo gel mele ho fang kkelal bo yebe lamlir panger yarmat, bo hare yebe yoh le iy yebe fang molow la tor siyal ngalir panger rechokla gel ho fang ngali.
Fael molow la tor siyal, ila mala yarmat rebe golah le gel chog Deus le ye katos iwe ngo re gola Jesus Kristus we ho fangdoh.
Isa kawraloh ssor la yam mo wol talop; Isa hamalo yengang kowe ho fang ngalyey bo ibe foru.
Deus Temay! Fang ssorol mele Lom mo irel lobola ho mel iyang, le be wochog ssor we ho fang ngali imol yodwe be subdoh faileng le.
“Isa hamdefa kofom ngalir rechokwe ho fang ngalyey mo lal faileng le, le gel mele ho lamlir, ngo gel mele ho fang ir ngalyey. Iwe ngo ir re talenga yalom.
Ngo igla ila resa gola le pangal meka ho fang ngalyey ngo ye budoh mo irem.
Isa kangalur molwe ho kangaluyey ngo ir re talenga; resa gola le katos bo ngang ibudoh mo irem, ngo sa tugul deper le gel mele ho fangdoh ngang.
“Ite memapel bo yaglir yarmetal faileng le, bo rechokla ho fang ngalyey le resa mel bo lamliyem mele imemapel bo yaglir.
Pangal meka ye mel irey ngo lamliyem, ngo pangal ikla ye mel irem ngo lamliyey, yesa lah ssor le yai mo irer.
Igla ila ngang ibele buyoy irem. Itay mel lal faileng le ngo ir ila re chil mel lal faileng le. Temay le ho Santus! Hadorar irel kamelal mala idem. Ila yid we ho fang ngalyey, bo be yoh le rebe sew chog le rebe wochog gich le si sew chog.
Yodwe imel irer ngo ihadorar irel kamelal mala idem le ila yid we ho fang ngalyey. Ikekafalir ngo tor semal ir le ye tamel loh, bo halachog yeramtawe ye tugul le yebe tamel loh — bo bela llah le katos molwe babior we ye santus ye sor.
Ngo igla ibele buyoy irem, ngo isa kapta meka lal faileng le bo fael mala be yoh rraey le yai ngalir le be kkel.
Isa kangalur molwe yalom ngo yarmetal faileng le resa hafobdirir bo fael mala te ir yarmetal faileng le, le re wochog ngang, le te ngang yarmetal faileng le.
Ite dangroh le hobe hachuyar mo lal faileng le, bo idangroh le hobe hafalir bo rede yoh long lal paol Satan.
Te ir yarmetael faileng le, le re wochog ngang, le te ngang yarmetael faileng le.
Holbuwar bo rebe santus irel mala ye katos; Mala pedal yalom ila ye katos.
Ifangloh ir lal faileng le, le ye wochog yam fangdoh ngang lal faileng le.
Isa fang ngang ngalug bo fal mala be wol yoh le rebe fang ir ngalug.
“Te ir chog mele imemapel ngalug bo yaglir, bo iwol memapel bo yaglir rechokla resa chepar irey, le fael mala yalom le meka redabeyey resa kapta ngalir.
Deus Temay! Imemapel bo hare be yoh le panger ngo rebe sew chog. Hobe tipingir bo be yoh le pangach ngo sibe rol sew chog le be wochog gel mo ngang le si sew chog. Hobe tipingir bo rebe sew chog bo yarmetal faileng le rebe chepar le gel mele ho fangdoh ngang.
Isa fang ngalir ssor we ho fang ngalyey bo be yoh le rebe rol sew chog le be wochog gich le si sew chog:
Ngang imel irer ngo gel ho mel irey bo be kkel yar sew chog, bo hare yarmetael faileng le rebe gola le gel mele ho fangdoh ngang, ngo ho hachangir le ye wochog yam hachangiyey.
“Deus Temay! Ho fang ir ngalyey, ngo ngang idipli bo rebe mel irel lobosla ima mel iyang, bo be yoh le rebe wiri falmay la yai. Ila falmay we ho fang ngalyey. Bo imol molwe yebe sub faileng le ngo gel ho faesul hachangiyey.
Tamay Deus le ho halongol katos! Yarmetael faileng le ila re toglah, iwe ngo ngang igulah, ngo rechoka ila resa gola le gel mele ho fangdoh ngang.
Ngang mele iforu le rebe golah. Ngo ibele tataboloh yai foru le be iye sengal, bo hare lepal mala changey mo irem, ngo yebe wol yoh ngalir; bo ila ngo ngang ibe wol mel irer.”
Wol miril yael Jesus mepel ngo iy mo mokwe redabeyal resa loh le re supiloh mololul wechich we Kidron, resa loh irel sew milay le ye mel loboswe.
Judas we ye fangloh Jesus ye gola loboswe bo sa cholop yael Jesus mo mokwe redabeyal ma werfengal mo iyang.
Judas yesa palir tot saldawel Roma mo tot mokwe posol Templum we le tamol temarong kowe, mo Pharisees kowe mele re hafdalerloh irel milay we, le re kak metal payur iwe mo habul mo duul.
Jesus ye gola pangal mokwe ye bele wel ngali. Iwe yesa gib ngalir ngo yesa kasiyar bo, “Itey le ha memeri?”
Ngo ir resa sor bo, “Jesusel Nazareth.” Ngo iy yesa sor bo, “Ngang iye.” Iwe ngo Judas we ye fangloh Jesus ye su luwulur rechokwe.
Yodwe Jesus ye kangalur bo, “Ngang iye,” ngo resa ger tefael resa ppungdiy wototol.
Jesus yesa wol kasiyar bo, “Itey le ha memeri?” Ir resa sor bo, “Jesusel Nazareth.”
Jesus yesa kangalur bo, “Sa mol yai kangalugmi bo ngang iye. Hare ngang mele ha memeriyey, ila ngo hasa ligdir ika sibis bo rebe loh lufulyer.”
(Ye kapta mele bo molwe yesa moal sor ila yebe llah le ye katos: “Tamay Deus, tor semal mo luwulur rechokwe ho fang ngalyey le ye tamel loh.”)
Simon Pedrus ila ye mel seyay sayden lol. Yesa yuldadah chog sa ffela ngal boy we yael Llulupal Temarong we sala ssupiloh rel talengal rewe gilemra. Idel iy boy la ila Malchus.
Jesus yesa kangalu Pedrus bo, “Hatefalilong sayden la lom lal mala liliyal! Ho luluwaley le itowe yulmi kapal hafohoy la mala Temay sa fang ngalyey?”
Saldawel Roma kowe mo tamol we yar, iwe mo mokwe posol Templum we resa ddorfi Jesus resa fargu,
resa hasiloh mwo irel Annas. Annas mele temal mala ril Caiaphas. Iwe ngo Caiaphas mele Llulupal Temarong irel raeg la.
Iy Caiaphas mele ye kangalur tamol kowe yar Jews bo ye far momay le semal yarmat mele yebe mes le fal ngalir panger yarmat.
Simon Pedrus mo semal mokwe redabeyel Jesus re dadabedoh miril Jesus. Yeramtawe choluwal Pedrus ila re gola fengalir mo Llulupal Temarong we. Ye dabelong Jesus lal yororol imw we imwel Llulupal Temarong we.
Iwe ngo Pedrus ye mel mo ligtam le ye mel lengchel hatemal yororol imw we. Molwe choluwal Pedrus yesa tefaelwey sala hapatpat ngal fefel we ye mel irel hatemal yoror we, iwe ngo yesa fesangulong Pedrus.
Fefel we irel hatemal yoror we yesa kasiya Pedrus bo, “Te wol gel semal mokwe redabeyel Jesus?” Iwe ngo Pedrus sa sor bo, “Yeb, te ngang.”
Ye kkel hareffoy, iwe boy kowe mo pos kowe resa tolu sew yaef resa su tebalililoh le re rerangir. Pedrus sa loh irer sala su lengcher yesa rerangi.
Llulupal Temarong we ye hadogoyu Jesus irel kofal mokwe redabeyal mo kofal foloy kowe yal.
Jesus yesa hatefaeli le ye sor bo, “Pangal yad ngo ima foloy luwul yarmat; pangal yai ma foloy ngo ima foloy lal imwel ttey kowe, mo lal Templum we irel lobokla yarmat rema tteydoh iyang. Tor mele ye llebag mo irel meka ima foloyu.
Ila ngo meda mele hala kekadogoyuyey iyang? Ha kasiyar rechokla re rongrong mekla ima kapta. Ha kasiyar mekla ikangalur bele re gola mekla ikapta.”
Yodwe Jesus ye sor molwe ngo semal pos kowe loboswe yesa ppigri ngo sa kangalu bo, “Meda mele la ila sengal yam hapatpat ngal Llulupal Temarong la iyang!”
Jesus yesa hatefaeli le ye sor bo, “Hare isa sor sew formel le ye machey, ngo hosa sor bo panger rechoka iga ngo rebe gola. Iwe ngo hare ye bung mokwe isosor, ila ngo meda fal le ho ppigriyey?”
Iwe Annas yesa fangloh Jesus le ye ffoar chog ngo resa hasiloh irel Caiaphas we iy mele Llulupal Temarong.
Pedrus ye chil su loboswe le ye rerangi, ngo tot rechokwe loboswe resa kasiya bo, “Te gel semal mokwe redabeyel mwal lay?” Iwe ngo Pedrus yete hawwele yal hapatpat ngalir le iy semal, iwe yesa sor bo, “Yeb, te ngang.”
Semal boy kowe yael Llulupal Temarong we ila yarmetal mal we Pedrus ye ssupiloh molwe talengal. Boy we yesa kasiya Pedrus bo, “Te gel molwe iwurug we ho mel irel mal lay mo woal milay we?”
Pedrus yesa wol sor bo, “Yeb.” Yodla chog ngo sa kkogo sew mael.
Lemaguyugol chog rallawe seral ngo resa hasi Jesus mo irel imwe imwel Caiaphas resa hasiloh irel molwe bugtal Aam. Tamol kowe yar Jews rete bulong lal imw we imwel Aam bo rede tungaf ngo hare be yoh le re bela dabey mongol Paska we.
Pilatus sa buyoy irer yesa kasiyar bo, “Meda mele mal le yesa hadre?”
Resa hatefaeli ngo resa sor bo, “Hare tor tayikof le ye foru ila ngo ha towe hasidoh irem.”
Pilatus yesa kangalur bo, “Ha hasi hami ha bela hatugulu kofal le habe dabey yami hatobtob.” Resa hatefaeli ngo resa sor bo, “Rete fang kkelmem le be yoh le habe limeseloh semal.”
(Yesa iye sengal mele bo yebe llah le ye katos molwe Jesus ye sor irel yodwe ye kapta wululul yal be mes.)
Pilatus sa tefael long yilim sa fesangu Jesus ngo yesa kasiya bo, “Gel mele yar Jews King?”
Iwe ngo Jesus yesa kasiya bo, “Gel chog yam kasiy mala, hare yor le yesa kangalug kofay?”
Pilatus yesa hatefaeli ngo yesa sor bo, “Ho chichiy le ngang semal Jews? Mekla yarmetal faliyem mo tamol temarong kowe mele re hasugdoh irey. Meda mele hosa hadre?”
Jesus yesa sor bo, “Mala lamliyey ila ye tamel lal faileng le; bo hare ye mel mala lamliyey lal faileng le, ngo mekla re pilyey rebe fedeg bo ngang ide yoh long lal payur tamol kala yar Jews. Yeb, mala lamliyey ila ye tamel lal faileng le!”
Iwe Pilatus yesa kasiya bo, “Gel semal king?” Jesus yesa hatefaeli le ye sor bo, “Gel mele ho sor le ngang semal king. Ngang isubdoh lal faileng le bo ibe kapta kofal mala ye katos. Semal le yema kapta mala ye katos ila yebe taelenga meka ima kapta.”
Pilatus yesa kasiya bo, “Mada mele katos?” Iwe ngo Pilatus yesa tefaelwey ligtam irer Jews kowe ngo yesa kangalur bo, “Tor mele ngang iwiri le derel yeramtale le hare ibe sor bo yebe mes.
Ngo ligdi bo siya ma faesul foru le irel yodol mele Bungul Paska, ngo ima hachuya semal chol kalbus le hami ha dipli. Ha diply le ibe taldi ngalugmi King le yar Jews?”
Iwe ngo ir resa tawulagililoh le re sor bo, “Yeb, te iy! Ha dipli Barabbas!” (Barabbas ila semal maelfefedeg ngo ye machoh.)
Iwe Pilatus yesa fangloh Jesus bo re bela wwodu.
Saldaw kowe resa foru sew ral ire kowe yor chil bo marel resa yetedah wol molwe chemal, iwe resa hamengagu ngal sew mengag le ye lelay ngo ye checcha mala ddolal.
Resa budoh irel ngo resa sor bo, “Yebe sulay King le yar Jews!” Resa dar ngali ngo resa ppigri.
Pilatus yesa wol tefaelwey irel buwa we ngo sa kangalur bo, “Ha kaladoh, ibele hasiwey yeramtawe iremi bo habe gola le tor derel le ngang iy wiri.”
Iwe Jesus yesa buyoy le ye mermar irel ral ire we yor chil ngo ye mengag irel mengag we ye lelay ngo ye checcha molwe ddolal. Pilatus yesa kangalur bo, “Ha kaladoh! Mal we iye le!”
Yodwe tamol temarong kowe mo mokwe posol Templum we rela wiri ngo resa tawulagililoh le re sor bo, “Ha krudu! Ha krudu!” Pilatus sa kangalur bo, “Ha hasi hami ha bela krudu. Tor mele ngang iy wiri le derel.”
Buwa we resa hatefaeli ngo resa sor bo, “Ye mel irel hatobtob la yamem le hare semal yebe sor bo iy Lol Deus ngo yarmat rebe limeseloh.”
Yodwe Pilatus yela rongrong molwe ngo yesa kkel loh tot yal motog.
Yesa tefael long yilim sala kasiya Jesus bo, “Iya lobosle ho budoh mo iyang?” Iwe ngo Jesus yete maliliy.
Pilatus sa kangalu bo, “Ho towe malili ngalyey? Ho togla le yor kkeley le ibe taldug, ngo ye wol yor kkeley le ibe fang gel bo re bela krudug?”
Jesus yesa hatefaeli ngo sa sor bo, “Mala kkelem uwoy ila Deus mele ye fang ngalug. Iwe ngo yeramtala ye fang long ngang lal pom mele yesa foru molfid la ye palleng.”
Yodwe Pilatus ye rongrong mele ngo yesa luwaley le yebe taldi Jesus. Iwe ngo buwa we resa tawulagili chog le re sor bo, “Hare hobe taldi yeramtala ila ngo te gel maryarel mala Llulupal Roma! Bo semal le yebe sor bo iy semal king ngo yesa hapaliyel ngal mala Llulupal Roma!”
Yodwe Pilatus yela rongrong mokwe re sosor ngo yesa hasiwey Jesus mo ligtam. Iwe ngo Pilatus yesa marrodiy irel molwe liliyer chol tatelal hapatpat mo wol dayif we rema sor bo, “Gabbatha” (le ila mele idal mo irer Hebrew).
Yesa harep wwelel yaal ralale mo imol chog molwe Bungul Paska. Pilatus yesa kangalur yarmat bo, “King we yami iye!”
Iwe ngo ir resa tawulagili le re sor bo, “Ha limeseloh! Ha limeseloh! Hala krudu!” Pilatus yesa kasiyar bo, “Ha dipli le ibe krudu king le yami?” Tamol temarong kowe resa hatefaeli ngo resa sor bo, “Mala Llulupal Roma mele yamem king!”
Iwe Pilatus yesa fang Jesus bo re bela krudu. Iwe resa hasiy Jesus.
Jesus yesa hayyefra krud we yal yesa buyoy mo yulgul hasohsoh yee, yela hola doh loboswe rema sor bo “Liliyel Pol Fusug.” (Hebrew rema sor bo “Golgotha.”)
Ila lobole rela krudu mo iyang. Iwe ngo re wol krudu rumal mal le re hallepda Jesus.
Pilatus ye teftafdah wol sedep pap iwe yesa fang bo rebe chifilidah woal molwe krudul Jesus. Ye tafa mele le ye sor bo, “Jesusel Nazareth, King we yar Jews.”
Ye cholop le ye yawli molwe bo loboswe re krudu Jesus iyang ila ye te ddaw tang hasohsoh. Ye teftaf irel yalol Hebrew, mo Latin, mo Greek.
Tamol temarong kowe resa kangalu Pilatus bo, “Ho towe tefa le yar ‘Jews King’ bo, ye momay le hobe tefadah iyang le hobe sor bo, ‘Mal le ye sor bo, Ngang mele yar Jews King.’”
Pilatus yesa hatefaeli ngo sa sor bo, “Mele isa tefadiy ila, ila mala yebe mel iyang.”
Yela wol miril yar saldaw kowe krudu Jesus ngo resa hasi mokwe mengagol resa hamhela uwor we re famal. Semal saldaw kowe ngo ye hasi sew. Re wol hasi molwe mengagol we ye lelay we sewloh chog molwe doddorol.
Saldaw kowe resa kapta fengali le re sor bo, “Si towe hatawsi mengag le bo si bele sulbweli hare itey semal gich le yebe hasi.” Iye sengal mele bo yebe llah le ye katos molwe babior we ye santus ye sor: “Resa hamhela mokwe mengaguy uwor ngo resa sulbweli le yebe hasi molwe mengaguy we ye lelay.” Iye sengal mele saldaw kowe re foru.
Rechokwe re su lengchel molwe krudul Jesus ila Maria we sil, mo mala bisil, iwe mo Mary we ril Clopas mo Mary Magdalena.
Jesus ye wiri molwe sil mo molwe redabeyal we ye hachangi le re su lobowe, iwe ngo yesa kangalu molwe sil bo, “Lom ila.”
Iwe yesa kangalu molwe redabeyal bo, “Solom ila.” Iye yodle molwe redabeyel Jesus ye fesangu Maria bo ye bela mel irel, irel bugtal.
Jesus ye gola le yela yodle ngo iy yesa hammalo pangal formel. Iwe yesa sor bo, “Isa betbat.” Ye sor mele bo yebe hallehaloh le ye katos molwe babior we ye santus ye sor irel.
Ye mel sew tohoh loboswe le ye ssogol wine kowe ye mwall. Iwe resa chiri sew forwa irel wine we resa yetedah wol sera ral hyssop resa hapecha ngal molwe yewal.
Jesus ye yulmi chog wine we ngo yesa sor bo, “Yesa moll!” Iwe yesa cchimdiy chog wototol ngo ye chuyloh yal ngas.
Iwe ngo tamol kowe yar Jews resa dangro Pilatus bo rebe hoppiy pecher rechokwe resa krudur, iwe ngo resa hachuyardiy mo woal krud. Re dongor molwe bo rallawe ila Halimralel yengang, ngo rete dipli le bela Sabbath ngo ye chil mel holong kowe woal krud. Bo Sabbath ila sew bong le ye palleng.
Iwe saldaw kowe resa hoppiy pecher rechokwe re krud sew mo Jesus.
Iwe ngo rela budoh irel Jesus re sala wiri le yesa mes. Iwe re tay hoppiy mokwe pechel.
Semal saldaw kowe ye hasi pochoch we sogol sa ddowu ngal molwe fael hadhadol Jesus, yodla chog ngo sa serdiy chael mo ccha wototol.
(Yeramtala ye wiri mele ila iy mele ye kapta kofal bo hare hami habe wol chepar iyang. Mala ye kapta ila ye katos, iy ngo ye gola le ye kapta mala katosal.)
Yela iye sengal mele bo be llah le ye katos molwe babior we ye santus ye sor: “Tor seyay mekla chil le be mahos.”
Ye wol mel lal babior we ye santus le ye sor bo, “Yarmat rebe kalngali yeramtala resa ddowu.”
Yela wol miril mele ngo Josephel Arimathea we yesa dangro Pilatus hare be yoh le yebe hasi molwe porgol Jesus. (Joseph ila wol iy semal mokwe redabeyel Jesus, ngo ye lebagili bo ye metagur tamol kowe yar Jews.) Pilatus ye kangalu bo be yoh le yebe hasi porog we, iwe Joseph sa loh sala hasi.
Nicodemus we yesa hamoal loh ye sala tefael mo irel Jesus lubungul seral, ye dabey Joseph, le ye hasi be subguy pawun irel loy le resa delali fengali myrrh mo aloes.
Mal kowe rumal re hasi molwe porgol Jesus resa dugmi ngal mengag, le re yitet loy iyang le re dabey mokwe kkor Jews irel haliliyel maes mo imol liblib.
Ye mel sew milay lengchel loboswe re krudu Jesus mo iyang le ye mel sew pey iyang le ye moch mol. Pele ila tedyor mwo le ye liblib iyang.
Resa yetolong molwe porgol Jesus lal pewe bo ila pela ye harep, iwe ngo bele la rallawe seral ngo Sabbath.
Ye chil ruchupung lemeralel rallawe Sunday ngo Mary Magdalena yesa loh irel pewe ye sala wiri le sa chuyloh porow we piltal molwe hatemal pewe.
Yesa ddar sa loh irel Simon Pedrus mo apostel we semal we Jesus ye hachangi ye sala kangalur bo, “Resa hachuya Samol mo lal pewe, ngo ha togla lobosle re sala itol mo iyang!”
Iwe Pedrus mo apostel we semal resa loh irel pey we.
Resa loh le re ddar iwe ngo ye mmid iwe semal mo imol Pedrus iwe ye sala hamoal hola pewe.
Yesa kallong sala wiri mengag kowe ngo iy yete bulong.
Simon Pedrus ye hamirdoh chog yesa bulong lal pewe sala wiri mengag kowe ye mel wototol,
iwe mo mengag we ye dudug ngal molwe chemel Jesus, le ye tamel luwul mengag kowe tot bo ye musloh le ye lul fengal.
Ngo apostel we semal we ye moal hola pewe yesa wol bulong, ye sala wiri mokwe ngo yesa chepar.
(Ir re temedaf chog irel molwe babior we ye santus ye sor le iy yebe molow tefael mo irel maes.)
Iwe resa tefael ngal molwe bugter.
Mary ye su yulgul pewe le ye tetang. Yodwe ye chil tetang ngo yesa hataeplong lal pewe
sala wiri rumal angelus le ye bbechrag mekla mengagur. Re maroro loboswe re itol molwe porgol Jesus iyang le semal ye mel mo wolul ngo semal mo wolpech.
Iwe resa kasiya we bo, “Fefel la, meda mele ho tetang iyang?” Iwe ngo iy yesa sor bo, “Resa hasiloh Samol we yai, ngo itugla lobosle re sala itol mo iyang!”
Iwe yesa tagul tefael sala wiri Jesus le ye su loboswe; ngo ye togla le Jesus molwe.
Jesus yesa kasiya bo, “Fefel la, meda mele ho tetang iyang? Itey le ho memeri?” Fefel we yebe kachog le chol milay we iy molwe. Iwe yesa kangalu bo, “Hare gel melap mele ho hasi molwe porgol, ngo hosa kangaluyey lobosle ho itol iyang bo ibela hasi.”
Iwe ngo Jesus yesa sor bo, “Mary!” Ngo Mary yesa tagul ngali ngo sa sor irel yalol Hebrew bo, “Rabboni!” (Fael mele ila “Sensey.”)
Jesus yesa kangalu bo, “Ho towe yangsiyey bo ited loh irel mala Temay. Ho loh irer mokwe wol bisiy ngo hosa kangalur bo ibele tefael loh irel mala Temay le wol Temer, le yai Deus ngo wol yar Deus.”
Iwe Mary Magdalena yesa loh ye sala kangalur mokwe redabeyel Jesus bo iy yesa wiri Samol. Iwe ngo ye wol kangalur molwe Jesus ye kangalu.
Lefhafel Sunday we ngo mokwe redabeyel Jesus resa rol ttey fengal lal sew imw resa loka mekla hatemal bo resa metagur tamol kowe yar Jews. Iwe ngo Jesus ye budoh sala su luwulur ngo sa sor bo, “Hopos be mel iremi.”
La wol miril yal sor molwe ngo yesa kewar ngalir mokwe paol mo fael molwe hadhadol. Yesa kkel yar rraey irel molwe resa wiri Samol.
Jesus sa wol kangalur bo, “Hopos be mel iremi. Ibele hagloyugmiloh le yebe wochog yael mala Temay hagloyuyeydoh.”
Iwe yesa yugugdah uwor ngo yesa sor bo, “Yebe mel Espritu Santus uwomi.
Hare habe hachuya fael yael yarmat molfid ngo yebe chuy, ngo hare hami habe te hachuya ngo towe chuy.”
Thomas we semal mokwe redabeyel Jesus (we rema fesang ngali bo Lubbe) ila ye tamel irel yodwe ye budoh Jesus.
Iwe rechokwe resa kangalu bo, “Hamem hasa wiri Samol!” Iwe ngo Thomas yesa kangalur bo, “Ibe te wiri ngo iyangsi gubul chifel kowe irel mokwe paol, ngo iyetolong payi irel giltal molwe hadhadol ngo iy towe chepar.”
La sew week mo wol miril ngo mokwe redabeyel Jesus resa wol ttey fengal yilim ngo yesa mel Thomas irer. Ye wol lok hatemal imw we re mel iyang, iwe ngo Jesus ye budoh sala su luwulur ngo yesa sor bo, “Hopos be mel iremi.”
Iwe ngo yesa kangalu Thomas bo, “Budoh bo hobe kemahoy ngo ho yangsi gubul chifel kowe irel meka payi, iwe ngo ho yangsi fael mele hadhadoy. Ho towe hayeyewala depom. Hobe hatugulu lal depom!”
Thomas sa hatefaeli le yesa sor bo, “Yai Samol ngo yai Deus!”
Iwe ngo Jesus yesa kangalu bo, “Hosa moch chepar irel mala hosa wiryey? Be momay deper rechokla re te wiryey ngo re chepar irey!”
Ye cholop kkemal kala Jesus ye foru le mokwe redabeyal re wiri iwe ngo yete teftafdiy lal babior le.
Ika ila yesa teftafdiy lal babior bo fael mala habe chepar le Jesus ila iy Kristus we Lol Deus. Iwe ngo yami tugul irel mele yebe yoh ngalugmi molow iyang.
Yela wol mwiril mele ngo Jesus yesa wol llah ngalir mokwe redabeyal mo irel Laom we Tiberias. Iye sengal yal llah ngalir;
Simon Pedrus, mo Thomas (we rema fesangu bo Libbey), mo Nathanael (we semal yarmetal Cana le sew mokwe faluyel Galilee), mo tarmal kowe lol Zebedee, iwe mo wol rumal mokwe redabeyel Jesus resa rol ttey fengal.
Iwe ngo Simon Pedrus yesa kangalur bo, “Ibele la fita.” Iwe ngo resa kangalu bo, “Habe daboh.” Iwe resa dage seyay boat resa loh re sala fitalbong yee, la rael loh ngo tor mele re hola.
Yela tehachdah yaal ngo Jesus ye su machngeted ngo mokwe redabeyal re togla bo Jesus molwe.
Iwe ngo Jesus yesa kasiyar bo, “Yor mele hasa hola?” Iwe ngo ir resa sor bo, “Tayissemalmwo.”
Jesus yesa kangalur bo, “Ha halgaloh wug la yami mo rela gilemra mo irel boat la, ila ngo be yor mele ha be hola.” Iwe resa halgaloh wug we sala ssogloh irel yig le tay bang le rebe yafsi tefaelidah.
Yeramtawe redabeyal Jesus we Jesus ye hachangi sa kangalu Pedrus bo, “Samol we mala!” Yodwe Pedrus ye rongrong le Samol molwe ngo yesa fargudah molwe mengagol llupwal (bo ye hachuya mokwe mengagol) yesa mmusloh leted.
Iwe ngo ikowe tot resa dagelong boat we hatalpiy le re lugsu wug we yar le sa ssogol yig. Rete ddaw tang fuluy bo medalbo yebe hal lemeg ngafal ddawer tang fuluy.
Yodwe resa dardah mo wulpiy ngo resa wiri yaef we yetoa le yor yig uwol, iwe mo flowa.
Iwe Jesus yesa kangalur bo, “Ha hasidoh tot yig kala ha moch hola.”
Simon Pedrus yesa herahdah yuchul boat we, iwe resa yuradah wug we wulpiy le ye ssogol yig, le subguy mo lemeg mo solmol pangal loh. Ila lepal yig we lal wug we ngo yete towas.
Jesus yesa kangalur bo, “Ha budoh bo habe mongoy.” Iwe ngo tor semal mokwe redabeyel Jesus le ye kkel depal le hare be kasiya bo, “Gel itey?” Bo re gola bo Samol molwe.
Iwe sa loh Jesus sala hasi flowa kowe sa ngaler, ngo wol ila sengal mele ye foru ngal yig kowe.
Iye mele hasluwel yael Jesus llah ngalir mokwe redabeyal mo wol miril yal molow tefael mo irel maes.
Rela mol mo irel mongoy ngo Jesus sa kasiya Simon Pedrus bo, “Simon le gel lol John, ye kkel yam hachangiyey mo imor ika sibis?” Simon Pedrus sa hatefaeli le ye sor bo, “Ngoa, ila sengal ho Samol, gel ngo ho gola le ihachangug.” Jesus yesa kangalu bo, “Hafalir saaf ka layi.”
Jesus sa wol kasiya tefaeli le ye sor bo, “Simon le gel lol John, ho hachangiyey?” Pedrus yesa hatefaeli ngo yesa sor bo, “Ngoa, ila sengal ho Samol, gel ho gola le ngang ihachangug.” Jesus yesa wol kangalu bo, “Hafalir saaf ka layi.”
Yela molwe hasluwal ngo Jesus yesa wol kasiya bo, “Simon le gel lol John, ho hachangiyey?” Yesa tayikof depel Pedrus irel molwe sa fael suluw yael Jesus kasiya bo, “Ho hachangiyey?” Iwe yesa kangalu bo, “Samol, pangal formel ngo gel ho gola; ho gola le ihachangug!” Iwe ngo Jesus yesa wol kangalu bo, “Hafalir saaf ka layi.
Ibe kangalug mala tosal: Yodwe ho chil tarmal ngo te tugul solbos le ho dipli bo hobe loh iyang ngo homa loh. Iwe ngo ho bela malelap, ngo ho bele hadingawey mekla pom, ngo semal yebe fargu sa palugloh solbos le gel hote dipli bo hobe loh iyang.”
(Jesus ye kekapta wululul yal be mes Pedrus le yebe kawraloh falmay la yael Deus.) Iwe Jesus yesa kangalu bo, “Dabeyey!”
Pedrus sa tagul tefael sala wiri molwe redabeyel Jesus we ye kkel yael Jesus hachangi. Iye iy yeramtawe ye roh ngal Jesus irel yodwe re momongol fehaf ngo yesa kasiya bo, “Samol, itey le yebe fangloh gel?”
Yodwe Pedrus yela wiri ngo yesa kasiya Jesus bo, “Samol, ifa sengal iye semal?”
Jesus sa hatefaeli, “Hare ngang idipli bo iyebe mel yee, la hola yodla ibe tefaeldoh iyang, ila ngo meda mele ho kasiy iyang? Dabeyey!”
Iwe sa medarloh kaptal molwe luwulur panger mokwe redabeyel Jesus, le yeramtale semal ila ye towe mes. Ngo ligdi bo Jesus yete sor le towe mes yeramtale. Jesus ye sor bo, “Hare ngang idipli bo be mel yee, la hola yodla iy be tefaeldoh iyang, ila ngo meda mele ho kasiy iyang?”
Iye molwe redabeyel Jesus we ye kapta kofael meka, ngo wol iy chog mele ye tefadiy meka lal babior. Iwe ngo hamem ha gola le meka iy ye kapta ila ye katos.
Ye cholop mekla Jesus ye wol foru. Hare pangal loh meka ngo ye teftafdiy lal babior, iwe ngo yai luluwal ila ye towe daw pangal babior kala lal faileng le.
Ssarol Wom Ho Theophilus: Irel metamol babior we yai ngo itefa kaptal pangal mokwe Jesus ye foru ngo ye foloyu irel yodwe ye chap yal yengang yee, la hola yodwe
ye bidah woal laeng iyang. Imol yodwe ye bele bidah wol laeng ngo yesa foloyur mal kowe yesa duwler bo lol apostel le ye foloyur irel mala kkamelal Espritu Santus.
Fayeg ral mo wol miril yodwe ye mes iyang ngo ye cholop yal ma llah ngalir, le ye holngol hatosiya ngalir le iy yesa molow tefael mo irel maes. Resa wiri ngal meter ngo iy ye kekapta ngalir kofal mala Lamliyel Deus.
Yodwe rela rol ttey fengal ngo yesa sor yalol le iye mele ye kangalur: “Ha towe chuy tang Jerusalem bo habe widi chog kkefang we isa kangalugmi kofal. Ila kkefang we mala Temay yesa hatugulu bo yebe fang.
Johannes ye baptismus yarmat irel chael, iwe ngo saaf e fedbong ngo hami ha bele rol baptismus irel Espritu Santus.”
Yodwe apostel kowe re ttey ngal Jesus ngo resa kasiya bo, “Samol, igala mele ho bele hatefali ngalir re Israel molwe lamliyer?”
Jesus yesa kangalur bo, “Te hami mele habe gola yodla iy, bo yodla iy mo ralla iy ila yusuwel chog mala Temay.
Halachog ila bela bidiy Espritu Santus uwomi ngo bele yor kkelmi, ngo ha bele mel bo yai tugul mo woal Jerusalem, mo woal pangal loh Judea mo Samaria, mo pangal balel faileng le.”
Wol miril yal sor mele ngo yesa llangdah mo imor yesa bidah woal laeng ngo ir re kekamahoy yee, sedep darmiy yela pilta loh.
Re chil kekaldah wol laeng irel yodwe yesa ligdir, ngo sa su loh rumal mal mo lengcher le re mengag irel mokwe ye bbech,
ngo resa sor bo, “Mall Galilee kala, meda mele hasa rol su hasa kakaledah chog woal laeng iyang? Jesus we sa lugdugmi yesa bidah woal laeng ila yebe tefaeldoh, le be wochog yami wiri igla irel yal bidah woal laeng.”
Iwe apostel kowe resa tefael loh Jerusalem le re budoh mo irel molwe Tayitel Olives, we be setab mile ddawal tang haplom we.
Rela bulong wol haplom we resa bidah irel singil we re memel iyang: Ir Pedrus mo John mo James mo Andrew mo Philip mo Thomas mo Bartholomew mo Matthew mo James we lol Alphaeus, mo Simon we semal Patriot mo Judas we lol James.
Rema toa ttey fengal rebe mapel, le ir mo mokwe wol bisil Jesus mo Maria we sil mo tot fefel.
Fedral mo wol miril ngo resa ttey fengal chotugul kowe, le malbo rebe subguy mo riyeg leper pangerloh, ngo Pedrus yesa sudah bo yebe maliliy ngalir.
Yesa sor bo, “Re wol bisiy, yebe llah le ye katos mokwe babior we ye santus we ye sor bo Espritu Santus ye kangalgich mo irel yael David kapta kofal Judas we ye palirdoh rechokwe re ddorfi Jesus.
Judas iwe semal choluwach, we Jesus ye duwley bo chilach irel yengang.”
(Judas ye chuwayi sedep bugat mo irel salpiy we ye yoh ngali irel molwe ye foru we ye tayikof; ila lobowe yela mes mo iyang. Ye ppungdiy sala tar molwe siyal, sala tappolwey mokwe yadol siyal.
Panger rechokwe re mel wol Jerusalem ngo re rongrong kaptal, iwe resa hadeda bugat la irel yalol faluyer le re sor bo bugtal Akeldama, le fael mele ila, “Bugtael Ccha.”)
“Bo ye teftaf lal molwe babiorol Psalm we ye sor bo, ‘Imw la imwal ila yebe poel chog; tor semal le yebe mel iyang.’ Ngo ye wol teftaf we ye sor bo, ‘Ligdi bo semal yebe yusuwiliy mo irel yengang la yal.’
“Ila semal yebe chilagich irel yach mel bo tugulul yael Samol Jesus molow tefael mo irel maes. Be semal mal kowe ye mel irech irel pangal loh yod kowe gich si dabe fedaley Samol Jesus irel malekah iyang. Ye chap mo irel yodwe Johannes ye foloyu kofal baptismus yee, la hola yodwe Jesus ye chuy tang gich sa bidah wol laeng.”
<range>
Iwe resa duwley rumal mal: Matthias mo Joseph, we rema ffesangu bo Barsabbas (ngo wol sew idal ila Justus).
Iwe ngo resa rol mepel le re sor bo, “Samol, ho gola yar panger yarmat luluwal. Kewar ngalugmem semal mo irer chole rumal le hasa duwler,
bo yebe mel bo semal apostel yebe liwli Judas we yesa chuy sa loh lobola faesul liliyal.”
Iwe ngo resa hattugul uwor mal kowe rumal, ngo Matthias mele re hatugulu, iwe yesa chilar apostel kowe seg mo semal.
Yela hola molwe Bungul Pentecost, ngo panger rechokwe ye tugul lal deper ngo resa rol ttey fengal chog solbos.
Re tedap loh chog ngo yesa ngung diy sew formel mo lal laeng le ye wochog ngungul yaeng le ye kkel, yesa ngunglong lal pangal loh imw we re rol maro iyang.
Iwe ngo resa wiri tot formel le ye wochog bbulul yaef le yesa iyyag fetang sa bidiy uwol semal mo semal ir.
Panger ngo resa ssogol Espritu Santus ngo sa chaep yar yalol sew mo sew fuluy, bo Espritu Santus yesa foru le yebe mmal le rebe yalol sew mo sew fuluy.
Yor yarmetael Jews le re mel woal Jerusalem, Jews ka re hasrowu Deus, le re budoh mo woal pangal loh faluyel faileng le.
Yodwe re rongrong ngungul molwe ngo sa ttey fengal sew buwal yarmat le ye paleng. Resa lluwdah bo semal ir ngo ye rongrong yar apostel kowe maliliy irel yalol faluyal.
Luwul yar lluwdah ngo resa sor bo, “Rechoka resa yalol faluyach, ngo ir yarmetal Galilee!
Ifa sengal mele pangach ngo si rongrong yar yalol faluyach?
Iye gich yarmetal Parthia mo Media mo Elam. Iwe ngo sibis gich re budoh mo woal Mesopotamia, sibis mo Judea, sibis mo Cappadocia, mo Pontus, mo Asia.
Iwe ngo sibis re budoh mo Phrygia, mo Pamphylia, mo Egypt, mo mokwe faluyel Libya lengchel Cyrene. Sibis gich re budoh mo Roma, le
Jews fengal mo Gentiles ka resa weg ngal taliw le yar Jews; iwe ngo sibis gich re budoh mo wol Crete mo Arabia — iwe ngo pangach loh ngo si rongrong yar yalol faluyach ngalgich le re sosor meka ye paleng le Deus yesa foru!”
Luwul yar lluwdah mo yar tay medaf fedal ngo resa rol kasiy fengal chog uwor bo, “Meda fael mele sa iye sengal?”
Iwe ngo sibis ir resa tape kamemal ngo resa sor bo, “Rechoka ila resa belasel wine!”
Iwe ngo yesa sudah Pedrus mo apostel kowe seg mo semal. Pedrus yesa maliliy ngalir buwa we le ye paleng yalol le ye sor bo: “Hami Jew ka woccholuwamem mo pangmi rechoka ha mel woal Jerusalem, ha talengayey bo iy be kangalugmi fael meka sa iye sengal.
Rechoka ila rete belas, we hami ha sor; igla ila moch duwow kolok lemaliyel.
Iye molwe profeta Joel ye kapta kofal we ye sor bo:
‘Iye mele ibe foru lal ral kala hartal ral, yalol Deus yal sor: Ibe fangdiy Espritu Santus le yusuwey uwor pangerloh yarmat. Mal mo fefel kala lomi re bele foloyu mele yaloy; tarmal kala lomi re bele wiri meka yebe weldoh iwe ngo malelap re bele ddal.
Ngo, boy ka layi mwo, le mal mo fefel ngo ibe fangdiy Espritu Santus le yusuwey uwor irel yodla, ngo re bele foloyu mele yaloy.
Ibele ffaor kkemal mo hagil mo lal laeng mo wol talop. Ngo bele llah ccha mo yaef, mo burah le yebe wochog darmiy kelay ye masosol.
Bele gul loh yaal ngo ye chechaloh metal meram le bele ddolol ccha, mo imol mala yebe hola mala Bungul Samol le ye falmay.
Iwe ngo te tugul semal le be ffesang Samol bo yebe tipngi ngo yebe molow.’
“Ha taelenga hapatpat ka re Israel! Jesusel Nazareth ila iy semal mal we Deus yesa hatosiya ngalugmi mala kkelal mo irel kkemal mo hagil kowe Deus yesa foru irel. Hami hasa spegil gola mele bo ye weldoh meka mo luwulumi.
Ye dabey chog luluwal la yael Deus le yesa faesul hatugulu le be yoh ngalugmi Jesus; iwe ngo hami hasa lliy irel yami fangloh iy bo rechokla re toa hamolfid rebe krudu.
Ngo Deus yesa hamolowa tefalidah mo irel maes, yesa taldi mo irel mala kkelel maes bo fael mala towe yoh le maes yebe hammachu.
“Bo David ye sor irel bo, ‘Iwiri Samol le ye mel imoy pangal yadol ngo ye mel chog rela gilemra irey ila tor mele ibe merah iyang.
Ila yesa rraey lal depey, ngo ye cchehas yai hapatpat,
bo ila mwo ngang semal re talop ngo sa luglug lal depey. Bo gel ho towe tahcheyey diy lal faileng le liliyer chomes; hare ho ligdadiy boy le lom bo yebe mongoangowloh lal lib.
Hosa kkewar ngalyey yalepal molow; ngo hobe harraeyiyey irel yam mel irey.’
“Rewol bisiy, ibe hawwele yai hapatpat ngalugmi irel kofal King David we yach chapdoh, we ye ffos idal. Ye mes resa leba, iwe ngo chil mel mele peyal irech igla.
Iy semal profeta ngo ye gola mala Deus ye hatugulu ngali: Deus ye hatugulu le yebe hasi semal mo irel chol daowe yael David bo be mel bo king le yebe wochog David.
David ye gola molwe Deus yebe foru, ngo yesa kapta kofal yal be molow tefael Kristus mo irel maes irel molwe ye sor bo, ‘Yete meldiy lobola liliyer chomes; ngo yete meldiy mala porgol lal lib.’
“Deus yesa hamolowa tefaeli iy Jesus le mo irel maes, iwe ngo hamem ha wiri ngal metmem le yesa molow tefael mo irel maes.
Deus le Temal, yesa hatagitadah Jesus bo bela mel rela gilemra mo irel. Ngo Deus yesa fang ngali Espritu Santus, we yesa faesul hatugulu bo yebe fang. Mele hami hasa wiri, ngo ha rongrong igla ila yal kkefang le sa fangdiy irech.
Bo te David mele ye bidah wol laeng; David ye spegil sor bo, ‘Samol ye kangalu yai Samol: Marro mo rele gilemra irey
yee, la hola yodla iy be yitlir rechoka re tayikof ngalug bo rebe mel bo liliyel pechem.’
“Panger re Israel ngo rebe gola le ye tugul le Jesus we hami ha krudu ila iy yeramtawe Deus yesa foru bo iy Samol ngo iy Kristus!”
Yodwe yarmat re rongrong mele ngo resa motog, iwe ngo resa kasiya Pedrus mo apostel kowe tot bo, “Ila ngo meda mele hamem habe foru?”
Pedrus yesa kangalur bo, “Habe harrig dipmi irel mekla molfidmi ngo hasa baptismus irel mala idel Jesus Kristus, bo ila ngo be chuy fael molfidmi; ila ngo be yoh ngalugmi Espritu Santus la yael Deus kkefang.
Bo ila mala Deus ye hatugulu ngalugmi mo mekla lomi mo panger rechokla re ddawloh — panger rechokla Samol le yach Deus yesa ffesangurdoh irel.”
Pedrus yesa hakkela yal hapatpat ngalir ngo ye wol cholop mekla ye kangalur, ngo sa sor bo, “Ha hataldagugmi mo irel hagerger le bele budoh le yar rechoka re tayikof!”
Ye cholop ir le sa tugul lal deper irel foloy we yael Pedrus iwe resa rol baptismus; rallawe chog ngo malbo be solngrras le re chilar chotugul kowe.
Resa itol deper irel yar kkay yalol foloy kowe yar apostel kowe mo yar hammal fengal mo yar daber irel mepel mo mongol fehaf we.
Ye cholop hagil mo kkemal kala apostel kowe re foru le panger yarmat ngo re lluwdah iyang.
Panger chotugul kowe ngo re tetaboloh chog yar hammal fengal ngo re rol teptap fengal irel mekla hapitgir.
Rema tap chuway mekla bugter mo liter, ngo resa hamhela mekla salpiyal uwor panger, le semal ngo ye hasi fechel mala yebe tapeli irel mekla ye hafohoy iyang.
Pangal ral ngo rema rol ttey fengal mo lal Templum we, iwe ngo re wol ma ttey fengal mo lal mekla imwer resa rol mongoy luwul yal fel mo yal cchehas lal deper.
Rema kapingpinga Deus ngo ye momay lal deper irel yar yarmat momay ngalir. Pangal ral ngo Samol ye fefang chiler le rechokla resa daor.
Seral irel suluw kolok lepelalyol, irel yodwe yodol mapel, ngo Pedrus mo John resa loh irel Templum we.
Ye mel semal mal irel loboswe rema sor bo Hatam Kamdidiy, le yela subdoh chog ngo ye mes mekla pechel. Pangal ral ngo yarmat rema hasiloh metal hatam le bo yebe dodongor salpiy mo irer rechoka rema bulong lal Templum we.
Yodwe ye wiri chog Pedrus mo John yar bubulong lal Templum we ngo yesa hafael pecher bo rebe fang ngali salpiy.
Resa kalngali ngo Pedrus yesa kangalu bo, “Kalngalugmem!”
Iwe ngo mal we yesa kalngalir, bo ye kacchog hare yor mele rebe fang ngali.
Pedrus yesa kangalu bo, “Tor layi salpiy. Iwe ngo ibele fang ngalug mala sa yoh ngalyey: Fael mala idel Jesus Kristusel Nazareth, ngo ibe kangalug bo sudah hosa darloh!”
Yesa holu rel paol rewe gilemra yesa tipingidah. Irel yodwe chog ngo yesa kkel loh mokwe pechel;
Yesa lutdah sa susu fedal, iwe ngo sa chap yal dedar fedal. Iwe yesa daber long lal Templum we le ye dedarloh ngo ye llulut ngo ye kapingpinga Deus.
Rechokwe re mel yilim re wiri yal dedarloh mo yal kapingpinga Deus,
ngo yodwe yela gel ngalir le iy mael hafohoy we yema maroro ngachel Hatam Kamdidiy we iy molwe ngo panger ngo resa lluwdah irel.
Yodwe mal we yesa dabey fedaley Pedrus mo John mo fael branda we rema sor bo yael Branda we yael Solomon, ngo yarmat resa lluwdah resa hamed ngalir.
Yodwe Pedrus ye wirir rechokwe ngo yesa kasiyar bo, “Re Israel, meda mele hala lluwdah irel mele iyang, ngo meda mele ha sala ffad ngalugmem chog iyang? Hasa sor le yamem chog kkemal, hare yamem santus mele yela mmal le ha foru bo yeramtale be darloh iyang?
Deus we yael Abraham, mo Isaac, mo Jacob, Deus we yael chapdoh kowe yach mele yesa fang ssarol Jesus we yal Boy. Iwe ngo hami ha fangloh iy ngo ha ttahcheloh mo fael metal Pilatus, ila mwo Pilatus ye sor bo yebe taldi.
Iy semal yarmat le ye momay ngo ye santus, iwe ngo hami ha tahcheloh, ha far hasi hasa dangro Pilatus bo yebe telad ngalugmi mael fefedeg we.
Hasa limeseloh yeramtala yema fang molow, ngo hala chog ila Deus yesa hamolowa mo irel maes — ngo hamem mele tugul irel mele.
Kkamelal mala idal mele yesa fang kkelel mal le ye mes meka pechel. Mele hami hasa wiri ngo hasa gola, ila ye yoh mo irel tugulul ladep irel mala idal; Yal tugulul ladep irel Jesus mele sa hachuya yal tomay, iye pangmi ngo hasa wiri.
“Iwe ngo igla rewol bisiy ila isa gola le molwe hami mo tamol ka yami ha foru ngal Jesus Kristus, ila ha foru luwul yami temedaf.
Deus ye faesul kapta muswe mo irer panger profeta kowe le Kristus ila yebe hafohoy luwul bareg, iwe ngo igla ila yesa ppalu ngali molwe ye sor.
Ha harrigi dipmi irel mekla molfidmi ngo hasa tagul ngal Deus, bo yebe hachuya fael yami molfid. Hare habe foru mele,
ila ngo ha bele kkel tefael irel haradiya la be budoh mo irel Samol, iwe ngo Deus yebe fang ngalugmi Jesus le iy Kristus le yesa faesul duwley bo yaglugmi.
Iy ila yebe mel chog wol laeng yee, la hola yodla pangal formel ngo bele tefoy tefael. Deus ye faesul sor chog mele muswe le profeta kowe re santus mele re kapta loh.
Bo iwe Moses ye sor, ‘Samol le yami Deus ye bele fang ngalugmi semal profeta le be wochog yal fangdoh ngang: semal le yebe budoh chog mo luwulumi. Hami habe talenga pangal mekla ye kangalugmi habe foru.
Semal le yebe te taelenga mekla profeta la ye sor ngo rebe hayyagi tangir meka lol Deus, bo rebe limeseloh.’
Iwe ngo profeta kowe, Samuel mo ikowe re miridoh ngo re faesul kapta meka sa weweldoh fael mwoka.
Meka ila Deus ye hatuguludoh chog mo irer profeta kowe lol le fal ngalugmi, iwe ngo ha mel irel Bogtag we Deus ye fang ngalir chapdoh kowe yami. Iye molwe ye kangalu Abraham bo, ‘Irel daola yam mele ibele holbuwar panger yarmetal talop le iyang.’
Iwe Deus yesa duwley Boy la lol ngo hami mele ye moal fangwey iremi, yebe holbuwahmi pangmiloh bo habe tagul tang wegdeg kala yami le ye tayikof.”
Pedrus mo John re chil kapatpat ngalir yarmat ngo sibis temarong kowe, mo molwe tamol posel Templum we, mo sibis Sadducees kowe resa dohdoh.
Resa rol ssong bo apostel we rumal resa fofoloyu ngalir yarmat le Jesus ye molow tefael mo irel maes, ngo hare be ila sengal ngo ye bele llahloh le ye katos le chomes rebe molow tefael mo irel maes.
Iwe resa ddorfir resa yitilir long lal kalbus yee, la ralawe seral bo yodwe ngo sa bong.
Ngo ye cholop rechokwe re rongrong foloy kowe yar le resa chepar ngo yesa tugul lal deper; iwe ngo leper mal kala resa chepar irel yodle ila bele limngeras.
Yela ralawe seral ngo mal kowe yar Jews, mo tamol kowe yar mo mokwe sensel Hatobtob we resa ttey fengal mo wol Jerusalem.
Resa ttey ngal Annas we iy mele Llulupal Temarong, iwe mo Caiaphas, mo John mo Alexander, mo ikowe sibis we chol haleng we yal Llulupal Temarong we.
Resa hasur apostel kowe mo imor ngo resa kasiyar bo, “Ifa sengal yami foru molwe? Yela budoh yami kkemal mo iya, ngo idel itey mele ha tapeli?”
Yesa bidiy Espritu Santus woal Pedrus iwe ngo Pedrus yesa sor bo, “Mal mo tamol:
Hare ha kasiyahmem igla kofal molwe ye momay we ha foru ngal mal we ye mes pechel le hare meda mele ha foru ngo sala chuy yal tomay,
ila ngo pangmi mo panger yarmetal Israel ngo ye momay le habe gola le mal le ye su imomi igla, ila ye chuyloh yal tomay irel kkamelal mala idel Jesus Kristus we semal re Nazareth. Ila yeramtawe hami ha krudu ngo Deus yesa hamolowa tefaelidah mo irel maes.
Jesus molwe babior we ye santus yesor irel bo, ‘Feas la hami chol fatfetal dayif ha tolpagililoh, mele yela llahloh bo ye hartal palleng pelal mo imol pangal.’
Yach molow ila ye mel chog irel; bo lal pangal loh ballel faileng le ngo tor semal mo solbos le Deus ye fang le be yoh le be hadoragich.”
Re lluwdah chol ttey we irel molwe rela wiri lepal kkelel depel Pedrus mo John, iwe mo molwe rela gola le ir rorumal ngo chototol le tor yar skun. Iwe ngo resa moch gola le ir faesul choluwal Jesus.
Iwe ngo tayor mele re chil gola le rebe sor bo resa wiri mal we yesa chuy yal tomay le ye su lengchel Pedrus mo John.
Iwe resa kangalur bo rebe buyoy mo lal imwel Ttey we. Iwe sala rol ir loh chog chol Ttey we yar rol hapatpat.
Resa rol kasiy fengal uwor bo, “Meda mele sibe faor ngalir mal ka? Panger yarmat wol Jerusalem ngo resa gola kkemal le rechoka resa foru, ngo towe yoh le gich sibe sor bo ir re kachapar.
Hare sibe hapolahoy yal pallengloh mele ngalir yarmat, ila ngo sibele kangalur rechoka bo tayor fael sew le rebe chil maliliy ngalir yarmat fael mala Idel Jesus.”
Iwe resa fesang tefaelirlong rechokwe ngo resa kangalur bo, tayor fael sew le rebe chil kapta kofal Jesus hare re foloy fael Idel Jesus.
Ngo Pedrus mo John resa hatefali ngalir le resa sor bo, “Hami mele habe hatugulu sew le ye fel mo fael metal Deus — hamem habe talenga yalomi, hare habe talenga yalol Deus.
Bo towe yoh le hamem habe ppoloh mo irel yamem kapta meka hasa spegil wiri ngo ha rongrong.”
Iwe chol Ttey we resa tefael ngali mokwe resa moal kangalur le sa kkel yar hapatpat, iwe ngo resa moch tahcher. Resa gola le towe yoh le rebe hagrer, bo pangal yarmat ngo resa kapingpinga Deus irel mokwe sa weldoh.
Mal we re foru kkemal we uwol sala chuy yal tomay ila sa ligdi fayeg lepal ragel.
Yodwe chog ye tal Pedrus mo John ngo resa tefael loh irer mokwe choluwar re sala kangalur mokwe tamol temarong kowe mo mal kowe yar resa sor.
Molwe chotugul kowe re rongrong mele ngo resa ttey fengal ngo resa mepel ngal Deus: “Tamem le ho foru laeng mo talop, mo taed mo pangal meka ye mel iyang!
Irel Espritu Santus mele ho kangal chapdoh we yamem, David, we yam boy, molwe ye sor bo, ‘Meda mele yarmetal Gentiles resa song iyang; meda mele yarmat resa foru mekad kala yar le tor pelal iyang?
Kingel talop le resa hafler, ngo resa ppil fengal tamol bo rebe fedeg ngal Samol mo Kristus la yusuwal.’
Bo tos le Yerodes mo Pontius Pilatus re ppil fengal mo woal haplom le, le ir fengal mo Gentiles mo yarmetal Israel bo rebe lliy boy we lom we hosa foru bo Kristus.
Resa ttey fengal luwul mala kkamelam mo mala depom bo rebe foru pangal mokwe, hosa faesul hatugulu bo yebe weldoh.
Iwe ngo igla ho Samol, talenga meka resa sor bo re bele foru ngalugmem, tupngugmem ho Samol bo yebe kkel depmem bo habe foloyu meka yalom.
Kawraloh mala kkelem, irel mala idel Boy la lom, Jesus, le ye Santus.”
Yodwe rela moll mo irel mepel ngo yesa falmor lobowe re ttey iyang. Yesa bidiy Espritu Santus uwor panger ngo sa chap yar kapta fedaley molwe yalol Deus, le sa kkel deper.
Sa sew chog yar chotugul kowe luluwal mo lal deper. Tor semal le ye sor bo hapitgil ila pitgil chog iy lufulyal, bo rema rol hammal fengal irel pangal mekla yor irer.
Iwe ngo luwul mala kkeler ngo apostel kowe resa hatosiya yael Samol Jesus molow tefael mo irel maes, ngo Deus yesa fangdiy yolbuw uwor panger.
Tor semal mo luwulur le ye hafohoy. Rechokwe yor bugter hare imwer ngo resa tap chuway, resa hasidoh salpiy we ye yoh doh mo iyang,
resa ngaler apostel kowe; iwe ngo resa hamhela salpiy we uwol semal mo semal ir, le semal ngo re ngaley lepal mele be tapeli irel mekla ye hafohoy iyang.
Ila sengal Joseph, we semal Levite, ngo yesub mo woal Cyprus, ngo apostel kowe rema ffesangu bo Barnabas (fael mele ila “Yeramtala Yema Hakkela Ladep”),
bo ye tap chuway mala bugtal sa hasidoh salpiy we ye yoh doh mo iyang sa ngaler apostel kowe.
Iwe ngo semal mal le Ananias idal mo molwe ril we Sapphira, re tap chuway mala bugter.
Iwe ngo resa kapta fengali mo molwe ril, bo Ananias yebe hasi tot mo irel salpiy we bo lol, iwe ngo sa hasi iwe ye mel diy sa ngaler apostel kowe.
Pedrus yesa kangalu bo, “Ananias, meda chog mele ye foru ngo ho sala yoh long lal mala yalol Satan iyang, le hosa kachepra Espritu Santus irel yam holu tefaeli tot mo irel salpiy we ye yoh ngalug mo irel bugat we ho tap chuway?
Imol molwe hobe tap chuway bugat we ngo ye faesul mel la bugtam; iwe ngo yela wol miril yam tap chuway ngo mala salpiyal ila lom. Meda mele hola luluwaley hobe foru tappel mala ila sengal iyang? Hote kacheprar yarmat — bo hosa kachepra Deus!”
Yodwe Ananias ye rongrong chog mele ngo ye pungdiy chog sa mes; ngo panger rechokwe re rongrong kofael mele ngo resa motog.
Resa bulong sibis tarmal resa dugmi molwe holongol resa hasiwey re sala leba.
Be suluw awa mo wol miril ngo sa bulong fefel we ril le ye togla molwe sa wel.
Pedrus sa kasiya bo, “Kangaluyey, iye lepal pangal salpiy we ye yoh ngalugmi mo molwe rim mo irel molwe bugtami?” Fefel we sa sor bo, “Ngoa, ila lepal pangal salpiy we ye yoh doh.”
Iwe Pedrus sa kangalu bo, “Meda fal le gel mo molwe rim ha luluwaley le habe hagla Espritu Santus iyang? Tarmal kowe rela leba molwe rim iyer kala resa mel lengchel hatam la igla, le re bele bulong rebe hasug!”
Yodwe chog ngo sa ppungdiy fefel we mo lengchel mokwe pechel Pedrus sa mes. Resa bulong tarmal kowe re sala wiri fefel we le sa mes, iwe resa hasiwey re sala leba lengchel molwe ril.
Panger loh chotugul kowe mo panger rechokwe re rongrong kofal mele ngo sa kkel yar motog.
Ye cholop hagil mo kkemal ka apostel kowe re foru mo luwulur yarmat. Panger chotugul kowe ngo rema toa ttey fengal mo fael Branda we yael Solomon.
Tor semal rechokwe te chiler le ye yoh le ye daber, ila mwo ngo yarmat resa kapingpingar loh chog.
Iwe ngo yesa chocholop loh chog choluwar — le mal mo fefel ka yesa tugul lal deper irel Samol.
Ila fal le yarmat resa ropropwey chotomay lal yalap. Resa hoalor woal bet mo lal chob bo hare mala mwo llurul Pedrus, ngo yebe bidah uwor tot ir le hare be darloh mo lengcher.
Iwe ngo resa wumagdah yarmat mo irel haplom kowe lengchel Jerusalem, resa hachewardoh chotomay, mo rechoka yor moniyan uwor; panger ngo ye chuyloh yar tomay.
Iwe ngo Llulupal Temarong we mo mokwe choluwal we chol rewe Sadducees, ila ye kkel yar rol ngol irer apostel kowe. Iwe resa luluwaley rebe faor ngalir sew formel.
Resa ddorfir apostel kowe resa yitilir long lal kalbus.
Yela lefhaf diy ngo semal angelus kowe lol Samol sa sugu hatmal kalbus we sa palirwey apostel kowe mo iyang, iwe ngo sa kangalur bo,
“Hala su lal Templum we ngo hasa kangalur yarmat pangal mekla kofal molow le ye tefoy.”
Apostel kowe re taelenga molwe angelus we ye sor. Molwe ye chil lemaguyog chog ngo resa rolong lal Templum we ngo resa chapiy yar foloy. Llulupal Temarong we mo mokwe choluwal resa fesangurdoh panger mal kowe yar Jews irel Ttey we yar we ye palleng; iwe ngo resa fangloh yalor kalbus bo rebe hasirdoh apostel kowe irer.
Rela loh tamol pos kowe irel kalbus we ngo re tamel apostel kowe, iwe resa tefael loh irel Ttey we re sala sor bo,
“Hala loh irel kalbus we ngo ye lok hatam ngo pos kowe re chil posaloh chog; iwe ngo hala sugaloh hatam kowe ngo tor yarmat yilim!”
Tamol temarong kowe mo molwe tamol posol Templum we rela rongrong mele, ngo resa hammeha hare iya mele resa loh apostel kowe iyang.
Iwe ngo sa bulong semal mal ngo sa kangalur bo, “Mal kowe ha yitilir long lal kalbus, ila re mel igla lal Templum we le re fofoloyur yarmat!”
Iwe tamol pos we mo saldaw kowe lol resa loh re sala hasirdoh apostel kawe. Rete ddingir bo re motog bo yarmat rede hacchifir.
Resa hasir long apostel kowe re sala hasur mo imor chol Ttey we ngo Llulupal Temarong we yesa kangalur bo,
“Hasa hatobtob mmay ngalugmi bo ha towe foloy fael Idel Jesus. Kemahoy meka hasa foru! Hasa hapallingiloh yami foloy woal Jerusalem, ngo hasa foru le yebe llah le hamem mele ha sor bo yebe mes Jesus!”
Pedrus mo apostel kowe tot resa hatefali ngo resa sor bo, “Deus mele habe taelenga yalol, te yarmat.
Deus we yar chapdoh kowe yach mele ye hamolowa Jesus mo irel maes, mo wol miril yami limeseloh we ha chifilidah wol krud.
Deus ye hamolowa tefali Jesus mo irel maes yesa hasi ye sala yitili rela gilemra irel. Jesus mele Tamol ngo Demer le yebe fang ngalir yarmetael Israel molower bo rebe harrig deper bo yebe chuy fael yar molfid.
Hamem mele tugulul meka — le hamem iwe mo Espritu Santus we yael Deus kkefang ngalir rechoka re talenga yalol.”
Molwe chol Ttey we rela rongrong mele ngo tay mmal yar ssong, ngo resa dipli le re bele fangloh apostel kowe bo rebe limeserloh.
Iwe ngo semal ir Pharisees kowe le Gamaliel mala idal; le iy semal mokwe sensel Hatobtob we ngo ye ssor mo irer panger yarmat, yesa sudah mo luwulur chol Ttey we. Iwe yesa sor bo rebe hachuyar mwo Apostel kowe mo irel Ttey we,
iwe ngo yesa kangalur chol Ttey we bo, “Re Israel, ha luluwaley hamayu mekla hasa sor bo habe faor ngalir mal ka.
Ha chil gola Theudas we ye budoh mwo fael sew yad, we ye sor bo iy semal yarmat le ye tagiyet, iwe ngo be fabguy mal we re dabey bo chilal. Yodwe re limeseloh ngo panger mokwe chilal ngo re medarloh, iwe ngo ye moloh iy rel ttey we yal.
Wol miril mele ngo yesa budoh Judas we semal yarmetal Galilee irel yodwe re ppapa yarmat iyang. Ye cholop le ye dabey ngo yodwe yarmat rela limeseloh, ngo pangerloh mokwe choluwal ngo re wol medarloh.
Ngo iye sa budoh igla ila iy bele kangalugmi bo tor mele habe faor ngalir rechoka. Ha ligdir! Hare mekla re luluwaley rebe foru ila ye budoh mo irel yarmat, ila ngo yebe wol moloh.
Ngo hare ye budoh mo irel Deus, ila ngo towe yoh le habe hapolahor. Hare habe foru mele, ila ngo ha bele happaliyel ngal Deus!” Chol Ttey we re talenga molwe Gamaliel ye kangalur.
Resa fesangur long apostel kowe, resa wwodur. Iwe ngo resa kangalur bo tayor fael sew le rebe chil foloy fael mala Idel Jesus. Iwe ngo resa moch tahcher.
Yodwe resa chuy apostel kowe mo irel Ttey we ngo resa rraey, bo Deus yesa foru yebe yor mmaler le rebe hafohoy luwul bbareg bo fael mala idel Jesus.
Iwe sa pangal ral ngo resa ma foloyu Hapatpat Momay we mo lal Templum we mo lal imwer yarmat, la iye Hapatpat Momay we kofal Jesus le iy Kristus.
Yela wol miril yodwe resa cholop loh tot chotugul kowe ngo yesa chaep yar hachocho fengal Jews kowe rema yalol Greek mo ikowe re faesul ir Jews. Jews kowe rema yalol Greek resa sor bo mokwe fefel faluyer we sa mes rir, ila re tayma pangir irel yar ma pawon salpiy seral mo seral.
Iwe Apostel kowe seg mo rumal resa hateyilir pangerloh mokwe choluwar ngo resa kangalur bo, “Ye tafel le habe tahcheloh yamem foloyu mele yalol Deus bo hare habe hammale mwo yengangel salpiy.
Ila rewol bismem, ha duwley fismol mal mo luwulumi le rechokla ha gola le ye mel Espritu Santus uwor ngo re repiy, bo sibe yitlir bo ir mele rebe salepa igegel mele.
Ila ngo hamem ha bele itol chog depmem irel mepel mo foloy.”
Pangerloh chol ttey we ngo ye fel deper irel molwe Apostel kowe re sor, iwe resa duwley Stephen, le iy semal mal le ye mel Espritu Santus uwol ngo ye kkel yal tugul, iwe mo Philip, mo Prochorus, mo Nicanor, mo Timon, mo Parmenos, mo Nicolaus we semal Gentile le ye budoh mo wol Antioch le iy ye moch weg ngal taliw we yar Jews.
Chotugul kowe resa hasirdoh irel Apostel kowe; iwe ngo Apostel kowe resa yetedah payur uwor rechokwe ngo resa mapel.
Iwe, sa chocholoploh chog le yesa tugul lal depal irel mala yalol Deus. Sa choloploh chotugul wol Jerusalem, iwe ngo sa wol cholop temarong kowe le resa weg ngal tugul le.
Stephen ila semal mal le Deus ye holbuwa ye sala kkemal. Ye cholop kkemal kala ye foru luwulur yarmat.
Iwe sibis yarmetal imwel ttey we yar Freedmen (we ila mele idal we rema sor) resa hapaliyel ngali. Yor Jews irel tteyle le re budoh mo woal Cyrene mo Alexandria. Ir mo wol sibis Jews kowe le re budoh mo woal mokwe faluyel Cilicia mo Asia, mele sa chap yar hachocho ngal Stephen.
Ngo Espritu Santus ye fang repiyel Stephen le ye bela sor sew ngo tor mele rema paliyal ngali.
Iwe resa fang salpiy ngalir sibis yarmat bo rebe kachapar le rebe sor bo, “Ha rongrong yael yeramtale hapatpat tayikofloh irel Moses mo Deus!”
Iye sengal mele re foru sala yoh le re hassongar yarmat mo mal kowe yar mo mokwe sensel Hatobtob we. Resa ddorfi Stephen resa hasiloh imol chol Ttey we.
Iwe ngo resa hasir long sibis mal bo rebe tungu kaptal. Resa sor bo, “Mal le ila yema toa hapatpat tayikofloh irel Templum le ye santus, mo Hatobtob we yael Moses.
Ha rongrong yal sor bo Jesusel Nazareth yebe hamderadiy Templum le, ngo yebe liwili meka faesul kkoch we ye budoh mo irel Moses!”
Panger rechokwe re marro irel Ttey we ngo resa haffeda chog Stephen, bo resa wiri wol molwe metal le sa wochog wol metal semal angelus.
Llulupal Temarong we yesa kasiya Stephen bo, “Tos mele?”
Stephen yesa sor bo, “Rewol bisiy mo re wotemay, ha talengayey! Imol yodwe chapdoh we yach, Abraham, ye chuy bela mel wol Haran, ngo Deus we ye mel luwul falmay yesa llah ngali mo wol Mesopotamia
ngo yesa kangalu bo, ‘Ligdir meka re bugtam mo mele faliyem, ngo hosa loh wol sew fuluy le ibele kkewar ngalug.’
Iwe ngo yesa chuy mo wol molwe faluyal sa loh sala mel wol Haran. Yela wol miril yal mes molwe temal Abraham, ngo Deus yesa kangalu bo yebe chuydoh wol fulu le hami hasa mel iyang igla.
Deus ye tefang bugtal Abraham mo irel fulu le, sugfed mwo mo iyang ngo yete fang ngali. Ngo halachog ila Deus ye hatugulu ngali le yebe fang bo bugter mo chol daola yal. Yodla Deus ye foru promise le ngo ted yor lol Abraham.
Iye mele Deus ye kangalu: ‘Chol daola yam ila re bela mel le wasola wol sew fuluy; re bela mel bo re hagloy ngo yarmat rebe tapey ssubu fedaler irel fabuguy raeg.
Halachog ila iy be fang yar hagerger chol fulu la rechoka re yengang ngalir. Iwe ngo bela wol miril ngo re bele chuy mo wol fulu la ngo rebe budoh bo iga mele rebe hasrowuyey mo iyang.’
Iwe ngo Deus yesa fang ngali Abraham sew hagil bo hagilel bogtag we. Iwe Abraham yesa faor hagil le ngal Isaac wol miril molwe sa sew wiik yal sub; Isaac yesa faor hagil le ngal Jacob we lol, iwe ngo Jacob yesa faor hagil le ngal tarmal kowe lol we seg mo rumal. Ika rechokwe chapdageldah dao ka yach.
“Mokwe lol Jacob resa loltemay ngal Joseph we bisir, iwe resa tap chuway Joseph bo bela mel bo semal slave woal Egypt. Ngo Deus ye mel irel Joseph,
sala hadora mo luwul weres mo hafohoy kowe ye bulong iyang. Yodwe Joseph yela budoh fael metal molwe kingel Egypt, ngo Deus yesa hafle wegdegel Joseph ngo ye fang repiyal. Iwe king we yesa duwley Joseph bo yebe mel bo Tamol Aam wol fuluwe bo yebe kemahoy pangal mokwe lamliyel.
Iwe ngo sa budoh sew laengda woal pangal loh ballel Egypt mo Canaan, ngo ye cholop le sa hafohoy. Tayor mongoy le ye yoh ngalir chapdoh kowe yach.
Iwe ngo Jacob yela rongrong le yor grain woal Egypt, ngo yesa hafdalerloh tarmal kowe lol we ikla chapdoh kowe yach. Ngo bele moch ila mele metamol yar loh woal Egypt.
Yela harwowel yar loh ngo Joseph yesa hagolal ngalir mokwe wol bisil le iy Joseph we bisir. Ngo moch iye yodle molwe kingel Egypt bele gola kofal daowe yael Joseph.
Iwe ngo Joseph yesa dengagloh Jacob we temal bo iy mo chol haleng we yar we re fisig mo limal ngo rebe bidiy woal Egypt.
Jacob ye bidiy woal Egypt, le ila lobole ir mo mokwe lol rela mel iyang yee, rela mes.
Panger ngo rela liblib wol Shechem irel pewe Abraham ye chuwayi ngal salpiy mo irel halengel Hamor.
